description: It's a better way to build frontend. It connects your Stories, Tokens, & Figma components. It lets you inspect designs with confidence and speed. And you can use it in Storybook.

name: Algofi
headline: Fast, low-cost crypto lending market on the Algorand blockchain
description:
Algofi is building a fast and low-cost lending market on the Algorand blockchain.

Building on Algorand enables < $0.01 transactions compared to ~$15 or more on other incumbent networks.  These high costs and slow transactions make decentralized lending markets inaccessible to the majority of potential users, something we are working to change.

Our long term goals are quite ambitious.  We aim to be the first crypto-native bank that bridges the gap between traditional and decentralized finance. The initial lending protocol will launch for users everywhere in Q4 of 2021, with additional fiat on- and off-ramp solutions, and more, forthcoming.

name: One Codex
headline: Data platform for metagenomics and the microbiome.
description: One Codex is a data platform for applied microbial genomics, enabling new and valuable applications in clinical diagnostics, food safety, and biosecurity. Acquired by Invitae (NVTA) in February 2021.

name: Emcee
headline: Increase conversion of your online store with a live shopping host
description:
Emcee helps e-commerce stores increase conversion with a live shopping host.

How does it work:
1. Emcee is a widget that integrates with a store like a chatbot button
2. We provide a live stream host tailored to the brand
3. The live stream host interacts with website visitors and increase sales

name: FirstIgnite
headline: Academic Experts on Demand
description: FirstIgnite helps connect companies, consultants and investors with global academic experts in order to help them make better decisions.

name: SOTERI SKIN
headline: Reinventing skincare science for eczema and chronic skin conditions
description:
Soteri Skin provides long-lasting relief for the 30 million Americans who suffer from eczema through product chemistry developed by a Harvard Chemistry Ph.D.  We bring this to consumers in an approachable non-prescription, skincare, D2C format.

How it works:
Skin surface pH is constantly in flux, and many of your daily activities can throw it out of balance. People with chronic skin conditions such as eczema have a harder time regulating their skin's pH. 

Soteri's patented pH/LOCK™ locks skin in at a therapeutic pH for 12+ hours, which is shown to help break the cycle of skin sensitivity, whether you have eczema, psoriasis, or just a bad sunburn.

Our formulations are aesthetically elegant (non-sticky, sit well under makeup, etc), safe for anyone to use, and don't require a prescription. Most people see skin health improvements within the first few weeks of application, even for tricky, chronic skin conditions like eczema and psoriasis.

With Soteri Skin, anyone can enjoy healthy, glowing, pH-enomenal skin!

name: GiveAway
headline: Community driven marketplace for used things and hot deals
description: We help to get rid of the things in your house that are no longer needed without spending any time or money.Our users bid on your items with virtual coins and can often find great products up to 95% off.

name: Kodex
headline: Easiest way for companies to process data requests from governments
description:
Kodex makes it easy for companies to process, and respond to, subpoenas from governments around the world. Agencies, like the FBI, subpoena user data from customers like Coinbase, and thousands of other companies - without Kodex, companies largely rely on email, fax, and spreadsheets to manage them.

Kodex is a SaaS tool that helps private sector companies manage relationships, workflows, and secure file transfer with government agencies who are seeking confidential information on a company's users. We streamline compliance operations, protect the privacy of their users, reduce error, and validate the legitimacy of government agents who are requesting information.

To date, we have launched with Coinbase, Kik Messenger, Whisper App, & Amino Apps. These companies alone receive over 20,000 data requests per year.

name: Basis
headline: Zapier for Data Science
description:
[Basis](http://getbasis.com) is a platform for building end-to-end data pipelines ridiculously fast — everything from ingestion to ETL, machine learning, automation, and reverse ETL in a unified framework with no data engineering required. 

Data tools on the market today are all about managing your data as exhaust. We're building Basis for a new era where businesses use data as fuel for their operations — embracing both analytical and operational paradigms in a single product. 

Nearly all companies today operate on the same SaaS platforms with common schemas, and are trying to solve the same data problems — we're uniquely positioned to win in a new market of cloneable end-to-end data solutions!

We're industry veterans who have built production data solutions at Google, Square, and our previous startups, and we're going after the +$100B business automation market with a data-driven, API-first product that gives data developers superpowers.

name: Realize
headline: Integrate your website or mobile app with popular retail brokerages.
description: Realize makes it easy for developers to build financial services on top of popular retail brokerages. For example, a portfolio rebalancing app can use the Realize API to place trades in a user's Robinhood and TD Ameritrade accounts to keep their portfolio at target levels.

name: Toolchest
headline: Computational biology tools in the cloud with a few lines of code
description:
Toolchest makes it easy for bioinformaticians to run popular computational biology tools in the cloud. Drug discovery companies use Toolchest to get analysis results up to 100x faster.

We provide Python and R libraries that customers use to run popular open-source tools at scale in the cloud. Toolchest is used wherever their analysis currently exists – whether it be a Jupyter notebook on their laptop, an R script on an on-prem cluster, or a Python script in the cloud.

name: OpenInvest
headline: Technology-enabled asset manager providing ESG-focused investments.
description: OpenInvest is the first technology-backed, socially responsible investment asset management platform that aligns your investments with your values. OpenInvest’s proprietary technology seamlessly creates low-cost investment portfolios tailored to your values, while tracking market indices. OpenInvest is one of the only VC-backed Public Benefit Corporations.

name: Revolve Surgical
headline: Surgical robotics for every operating room
description:
Revolve is building the world’s only surgical robot designed for every operating room. Its simple yet powerful design makes it the only robot that can service the 1M+ abdominal surgeries performed outside of hospitals in the US every year.

The founders met at the top surgical robotics lab in the country where they worked on next-generation surgical tools for the da Vinci Surgical System. Collectively, they’ve worked on medical robots for applications in general surgery, ENT, urology, dentistry and neurosurgery; medical imaging AI (ex-Swift Medical); rehabilitation devices, surgical instruments for pediatrics; the Ford GT; and a lunar rover.

Revolve’s surgical robotics platform has been developed in collaboration with over 50 surgeons, resulting in a system that is just 1% of the size and cost of competitor devices. The robot has been validated through animal testing, and the company has secured LOIs from Buffalo General Hospital and Pearl Women’s Center.

name: Flockjay
headline: Unlock knowledge within people & teams to achieve their full potential
description: Flockjay’s Sales Elevation platform captures winning strategies from internal stars and external experts, coaches reps with real-time training, and motivates teams to implement and adapt best practices.

name: Mecho Autotech
headline: On-demand  auto maintenance & repairs
description:
It is cumbersome to maintain/repair vehicles in Africa. Vehicle owners currently have 2 options to choose from; very expensive and geographically limited branded mechanic garages (less than 1% of the supply pool) or unvetted roadside mechanics (about 99% of the supply pool). 

About 95% of vehicle owners cannot afford branded garages where quality and reliable service delivery can be guaranteed and thus rely on roadside mechanics. However, low quality and transparency are typical issues associated with roadside mechanics. 

We created a network of vetted mechanics, spare part vendors and an app that enables easy booking, payment and mechanic matching process. Via the mecho app, a customer or business can make a request for any automobile service (repairs or regular servicing) or part.

name: MarketForce
headline: The operating system for informal merchants in Africa.
description:
MarketForce empowers consumer brands to manage their field sales activities and grow their distribution channels in Africa, and other emerging markets. 

We enable informal merchants to source, order and pay for inventory at any time via interactive SMS and mobile app, and get it delivered within hours. We also empower them to collect digital payments and make extra money by reselling digital financial services such as airtime, electricity tokens and bill payments. 

MarketForce is already enabling trade across 20,000+ retailers, and $500 million in transactions have been processed through the platform to date. We have raised $2,500,000 in seed funding from a group of strong institutional and angel investors, including Future Africa, Launch Africa, Greenhouse Capital, V8 Capital, Reflect Ventures, Rebel Fund, Remapped Ventures, EchoVC Partners, P1 Ventures and Ventures Platform.

name: Savvy
headline: Custom, embeddable user flows for your website or app
description: We replace fork builders like Typeform and custom code as the way you collect information from users using low code tools. For example you’re a health tech startup and want an onboarding flow but don’t want to use Typeform and don’t have engineering budget. You can use Savvy to build a totally custom concierge flow and embed it in your app. Then make edits and view analytics without code.

name: Overview
headline: Computer Vision Platform for Manufacturing
description: Overview is a company that takes the cutting edge in computer vision and deep learning and applies it to previously unsolvable manufacturing inspection problems. We are truly a full stack company. We install physical cameras into the facility, run inference on the edge and manage massive deployments. Overview also streams gigabytes of video/image data to the cloud for our web platform to give customers advanced insights and analytics.

name: Dyte
headline: Real-time audio & video SDKs, ready to launch 🚀
description: Integrate live video calls with Dyte Video SDK with less than 10 lines of code.

name: The Breakaway
headline: A motivational coaching platform for fitness enthusiasts.
description:
The Breakaway is a motivational coaching app for fitness enthusiasts, starting with cyclists. Our subscribers sync data from platforms like Peloton, Zwift and Garmin and log in daily to get motivation, coaching, and personalized challenges.

Our mission is to help people improve.

This is a re-invention of coaching and improvement. In five years, when every physical activity has data attached to it, everyone will want a coach at their fingertips. This is not an individual trainer, not a 7 day a week training plan, but a smart, simple digital coach that knows them across data platforms and helps them achieve their goals day after day, week after week, year after year. We are starting with cycling but we will evolve this to all digital fitness activities over time.

The Breakaway is for anyone who is committed to improving their fitness, and in doing so, improving their life.

Our subscription app is live in the Apple App Store. Our core team was among the first Strava employees and we have built engaging products for athletes all over the world. We live for this stuff.

name: Fieldproxy
headline: No code App Builder for organizations with Field Teams
description:
Fieldproxy is that lets businesses with large field teams streamline their on ground operations. We do this by providing a SaaS platform that helps these businesses build custom apps for their field team using a simple no-code builder. 

Fieldproxy's vision is to be the Operating System for Field teams.

name: Hyperseed
headline: No-code platform for finance professionals
description:
Hyperseed is the no-code platform for finance professionals.

We aim to empower finance professionals to build custom financial applications, such as price configurators, without writing a single line of code and to update them with a few clicks. Think about us as Excel for the 21st Century: we’re building what Excel could be if you could press a button and automatically create user-facing applications.

name: Heru
headline: Tax automation services for the gig-economy workforce in Latin America
description:
Heru is the tech-based tax solution that automates tax filing procedures for independent workers in Latin America. Our technology automatically, files taxes, deducts expenses, emits invoices and collects payments all from one app. Easy, transparent and automated.

145 million of gig/independent workers in Latin America face constant stress derived from their lack of knowledge on tax related issues.

By providing gig/independent workers a suite of tax based solutions, we will allow them to further progress in their professional and personal wellbeing.

Despite being the biggest portion of the total workforce in Latin America (52%), independent workers are the less knowledgeable on taxes.

name: Ahazou
headline: Podium for local businesses in Latam
description: Ahazou is a SaaS app that helps offline local businesses to connect online with their customers to promote their brand, to build their reputation and to sell more. We've reached USD100k MRR with 16k+ subscribers. Our vision is to build the next all-in-one platform for 50 million local businesses to grow online in Latam. The company is founded by Rui Miadaira - 10+ years building local businesses, 3x entrepreneur, tech background with a Harvard MBA - and has built a team from iFood, Movile, PicPay. Ahazou is backed by GFC, Monashees, Y Combinator (S21) and more.

name: Perl Street
headline: Developing the next-generation of infrastructure projects
description:
Perl Street builds bankable projects, unlocking billions in financing for sustainable infrastructure and next-generation hardware technologies. 

By democratizing project finance structures through our platform, Perl Street has already helped multiple hardware startups receive over $130M in financing offers from some of the world’s most reputable institutions.

Climate change is a massive hardware problem. According to IEA estimates - reaching net zero emissions would require over $4 trillion per year in global clean energy investment. 

This means we need to upgrade nearly everything with new hardware - from energy storage devices to electric vehicles, charging stations and building electrification. The future of infrastructure is both distributed and resilient. And none of it is possible without financing new hardware.

name: Finnt
headline: DeFi made accessible
description:
Finnt makes it easy for anyone to earn high interest rates from the crypto market. 
Instead of trying to figure out how Web3 works, pick up the right DeFi protocol or the last hyped coins, our users come to Finnt and just have to deposit funds to start earning daily. 
We design financial products that are made for the long term and help our users to build wealth just like they would do with a savings account for their kids or a retirement plan.

name: Monto
headline: Shopify App Store for Webflow Ecommerce
description: Monto is like the Shopify App store for the Webflow Ecommerce. We're building the must have tools to turn your Webflow Ecom site into a true Ecommerce Business.

name: Pide Directo
headline: Enabling brands in LatAm to sell direct and deliver in under 30min.
description:
PideDirecto is a branded digital ordering and delivery solution for local buisness in Latam. We build out their direct-to-consumer sales channels and enable them to deliver their products in under 30 minutes. 

We empower local buisness such as restaurants, pharmacies, local grocery stores, flower shops, clothing stores, cake shops and many more by building out their own branded website, integrating phone and social media orders and helping them deliver their products in less than 30 minutes. While also providing our partners key customer insights and marketing support. 

All for a reasonable fixed monthly fee, without eating up margins with hefty commissions and service charges.

name: Jerry
headline: A Super app for car owners to save money on car expenses.
description:
A mobile-first car ownership super app, Jerry launched in 2019 with its AI- and machine-learning-based car insurance comparison service and today serves nearly 1 million customers across the United States.

Jerry is removing existing time- and money-saving barriers by making insurance shopping effortless. 

The fastest, easiest and only automated way to compare and save on car insurance, Jerry is the car insurance platform that gives you the best, customized quotes from more than 45 insurance carriers in 45 seconds. Jerry customers skip all the long forms and unwanted human interaction while Jerry hunts for better rates, completes the transaction, and even cancels former policies on their behalf. 

Based on the fundamental goal of making customers happy by saving them time and money, Jerry is scaling its car insurance product and hiring talent to expand its marketplace into additional categories, removing friction from additional car ownership needs. Jerry will be the only app car owners need to save time and money on all their car expenses.

Headquartered in Palo Alto, the company has offices in Toronto, and Lockport, NY, and has removed physical location from recruiting restraints to capture talent.

name: Jovian
headline: Online Stanford for Data Science and Machine Learning
description:
Jovian is the online Stanford for data science and machine learning. We run a 6-month part-time data science program where we train professionals with a background in programming, statistics, or analytics to become data scientists. Students learn practical skills, build real-world portfolio projects, and undergo 4 weeks of job readiness training. Our tutors offer 24x7 guidance & mentorship over Slack & Zoom.

Here’s what students spend 600+ hours learning & practicing:

1. Python Programming (Jupyter, Functions, Classes, Web Scraping, Git ...)
2. Statistics for Data Science (Probability, Statistics, Hypothesis Testing ...)
3. Data Analysis with Python (Numpy, Pandas, Data Cleaning & Wrangling ...)
4. Data Visualization with Python (Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Folium ...)
5. Machine Learning with Python (Regression, Random Forests, GBMs ...)
6. Product Analytics and Tools (SQL, Excel, Tableau, Google Analytics ...)

Students solve 10 coding assignments and build 3 real-world projects:
1. Web Scraping with Python
2. Exploratory Data Analysis & Visualization
3. Machine Learning with Python
Every student picks unique project topics & writes detailed project reports. 

If you're hiring for data science roles, write to support@jovian.ai .

name: Lucira Health
headline: Next generation infectious disease test kits
description: Diassess Inc. is revolutionizing the way infectious diseases are prevented, diagnosed, and monitored by developing the tools necessary to empower people to become knowledgeable about their health. We produce inexpensive, disposable health diagnostic hardware that transforms any smartphone into a portable, real-time health-monitoring device for rapid, accessible, multiplexed analysis of bodily fluids anywhere in the world.

name: Postscript
headline: A conversational commerce platform for Shopify merchants.
description: We help brands engage with customers via text message. This includes marketing campaigns, automations, order follow-ups, and customer service.

name: Machine Zone
headline: Pioneers of mobile social gaming.
description: Live data powers everything we do—from our global, multiplayer mobile games to our mobile ad buying to our live data ecosystem, Satori. MZ is creating new futures for people, enterprises, cities, and countries. The possibilities are endless.

name: Ambient.ai
headline: AI-powered environments that are safe, efficient, and sustainable.

name: CaptivateIQ
headline: A no-code SaaS solution to manage and track sales commissions.
description:
CaptivateIQ is on a journey to modernize the world of incentive compensation. Our hope is that people will feel more connected at work if there is greater transparency in how they are rewarded for their efforts.

We partner with amazing companies like Carta, Intercom, Gong, and Newfront Insurance to simplify their commissions. 

Since launching in 2017, we have raised $63M and are backed by leading investors including Sequoia Capital, Accel, S28 Capital, Amity Ventures, and Y Combinator.

name: Rownd
headline: Stripe for user accounts and personal data
description: Rownd makes account creation so easy, that any visitor to a company's website can instantly be converted to an account-holding customer. By adding our simple code snippet that authenticates visitors to any website, a startup can increase conversion by 50%.

name: Atomic Alchemy
headline: Producing high-value isotopes for the world
description:
Atomic Alchemy is building a bank of reactors to produce the nuclear material that goes into nuclear medicine. Radiopharmaceuticals are vitally important in biological tracers, diagnostic imaging, and cancer treatments.

Currently, the world's supply of Molybdenum-99, the cornerstone of 80% of all nuclear medicine procedures, is sourced from just six government-run, scientific research reactors abroad. Five of these reactors are 45-65 years old and are quickly coming to the end of their operational life. This has cultivated a fragile and lengthy supply chain, at odds with the nature of radioactive material.

This issue and its implications do not just effect molybdenum, but any other reactor-based isotope. Many promising cancer therapies are stuck in clinical trials, unable to secure enough material in a timely manner. Research doesn’t even happen because of the difficulty of sourcing any new isotopes.

It doesn't have to be this way. Atomic Alchemy is working to solve this by building the world's first scalable radioisotope production facility. This facility will contain the world’s first privately-owned nuclear reactors dedicated to radioisotope production.

name: KaiPod Learning
headline: Making online learning more personal and more social
description:
KaiPod Learning works with middle- and high-school students who go to school online. We provide a physical place for these students to work on their classes, to interact with other students, and to get support from teachers.

Our founder was the CPO of Pearson Online Schools and knows that despite all the noise around online learning, millions of kids thought it was the best school they ever had! But they *needed* a place to go for in-person support. 

In our summer pilot, we tripled the rate of academic progress *and* received an NPS of 100. Now, we are getting ready to launch our first locations this fall.

After COVID, we will see at least 5 million students opt-in to online learning and we will license our platform and approach to anyone who supports these students.

name: Verdn
headline: An API to bundle trackable, sustainable pledges with any transaction.
description:
Our mission is make sustainability profitable. 

Our API lets companies bundle sustainable pledges, such as tree planting, ocean-bound plastic cleanup, and coral planting, with any transaction. These pledges can be tracked on unique dashboards by the company's end-customers, and are carried out by world-leading NGOs.

With our tracking dashboards, companies are able to boost their post-purchase engagement 10x compared to email marketing, increase repurchasing rates, and boost social media shares.

name: Navattic
headline: Interactive product demos
description: Navattic helps sales and marketing teams create interactive product demos.

name: Hera
headline: Calendar app to prepare, join and follow-up on virtual meetings
description:
Google Calendar is built on hypotheses that are now deprecated. Now that most of our meetings are virtual, there is a massive opportunity to remove frictions at each step of the lifecycle of these meetings, and finally make calendars actionable.

From Hera, users can:
- Schedule a meeting or share availabilities
- Prepare a meeting with the right context on attendees and past discussions
- Join a meeting in one-click
- Snooze a meeting to make sure you don't forget to follow-up

All of that without leaving the keyboard.

name: Kapital
headline: Business banking & credit for SMB's
description:
B2B Technology (SaaS)
All-in Banking Suite that help SMBs gain visibility and control of their Treasury:
- Multi-Treasury: unlimited debit accounts in one place
- Expenses management ´platform & prepaid cards 
- Payroll Payment System
- BNPL Corporate Credit Card

All-in-one financial inclusive products for the employees:
- Payroll Wallet
- Payroll Advance Loans
- Buy Now Pay Later Credit Card

Different from other BNPL companies we need no integration or alliance with the commerce, once our client gets their credit card they start paying at any commerce, online or physical, and with the help of our app decide the number of months to pay the purchase.

....and fighting climate change!

name: Castled Data
headline: Activate data from your warehouse into business apps (Reverse ETL)
description: Castled is an operational analytics platform, designed to empower the sales/marketing/support functions of your business with valuable customer insights straight from your data warehouse, thereby sky rocketing your sales ROI. It also helps run personalised marketing campaigns using data insights and improve your conversion. Castled is open-source and supports all major warehouses and major SaaS apps including Salesforce, Hubspot, Intercom, Mailchimp and Google Ads and the list is expected to grow exponentially in the coming months.

name: PostHog
headline: Open source product analytics, self-hosted or in the cloud.
description:
We’re working to increase the number of successful products in the world

We’re a small (but growing) team building an open source platform that empowers customers to create successful products.

Until now, tools for building products have been fragmented. Product analytics, heat maps, session recording and A/B testing all provide immense value, but existing tools weren’t natively built to work together.

PostHog is different by offering these tools (and more) in a single platform that you can host yourself.

We started PostHog as part of Y Combinator's W20 cohort and had the most successful B2B software launch on HackerNews since 2012 - with a product that was just 4 weeks old.

We're proudly backed by some of the world's top investors and believe in product-led growth, where we build something awesome and let our product bring the users, rather than an outbound sales team and regular cold calls.

What does this mean for you? We have a lot of capital, but we're a lean, strong team - so you've got the opportunity to have a huge impact.

Check out posthog.com/careers if you want to be part of this journey.

name: Burrow
headline: A furniture brand creating award winning, innovative designs.
description: Burrow is the clever, direct-to-consumer furniture company reinventing the way people furnish their home. The original Burrow Sofa was launched in 2017 to fix the frustrations associated with the furniture industry. In 2018, Burrow was named one of the 10 most innovative retail brands in the world by Fast Company, and the Burrow Sofa was named one of the 50 best inventions of the year by TIME. Burrow products ship within a week, assemble and disassemble easily, and are sustainably made – all without sacrificing style, quality, or comfort. Headquartered in New York City, customers can visit their flagship store, Burrow House, in the SoHo neighborhood of Manhattan, or browse their entire catalog at www.burrow.com.

name: Vanta
headline: Automated security and compliance for startups.
description:
Vanta simplifies the complex, time-consuming, and tedious process of preparing for a SOC 2 audit.

**How it works**

We’re automating security and compliance, starting with SOC 2
1. Connect your tools and infrastructure
2. Customize Vanta to your company
3. Fix items on your “to do” list
4. Complete an audit with an AICPA-certified auditor

**What we do**
We started by building the simplest way for a company to prepare for a SOC 2 assessment.

We started with SOC 2 because it was the most common way for an internet business to prove its security. In the course of building for SOC 2, we built out a suite of security tools that every internet business needs: laptop management, account monitoring, employee onboarding and offboarding, cloud infrastructure configuration, policy documentation, and more.

Over time, we’ll add additional certifications (HIPAA, ISO) and partner with industry experts to bolster the ways a business’ security is proved. We’re just getting started.

Our goal is to demystify internet security to the average person, equipping beginners with sane defaults and growing them into security-savvy principals who can explain how their company protects customer data and why their business is worthy of your trust.

name: Termius
headline: Termius is an SSH client with team collaboration features
description: Termius is an SSH client that works on desktop and mobile. It syncs and shares data via a secure vault in the cloud, like a password manager. With Termius, engineering and DevOps teams can share the list of servers that can be organized in groups and tagged for faster search. Termius also has built-in Terminal and Snippet Sharing. Terminal Sharing enables getting instant help from colleagues via providing a unique link instantly, and snippets are frequently-used shell commands that allow teammates to learn from each other easily.

name: Hiration
headline: We help job seekers quickly create resumes that get 2X more interviews
description:
Our SaaS product solves the different problems that job seekers face in the process of finding a new job - creating an efficient resume, writing a cover letter/email, updating their LinkedIn profile, applying to suitable jobs, interview preparation...
It's the 1st time in history that we've been able to create resumes using technology that surpass human made resumes.
This is a novel way to add active job seekers to our database of resumes as none of the incumbents are focussing on candidates' problems.
100k+ new active job seekers are added to our database every month, growing rapidly.
As the next step, we are launching a recruitment marketplace to close the loop.

name: Eden Workplace
headline: The complete suite of workplace software for hybrid companies.
description: Eden Workplace is the complete suite of software to manage the modern hybrid office. Our SaaS offerings include COVID Team Safety, Visitor Management, Desk Reservations, Room Scheduling, Facilities Management, and more.

name: Dashlabs.ai
headline: Lab software for emerging markets
description: Dashlabs.ai provides DIY lab software. We focus on small and mid-sized labs in emerging markets that still do manual processes, and don’t have access to good lab software.

name: Kodda
headline: Lemonade for LatAm
description:
We make insurance as easy as ordering food delivery.

Instead of doing 10 hours of paperwork dealing with brokers and traditional insurance companies you simply go to our website, get covered in under 90 seconds, claim in minutes and get paid fast.

name: Whatnot
headline: Livestream shopping platform and marketplace.
description:
Whatnot is a livestream shopping platform and marketplace where you can buy, sell, go live and geek out with collectors and other like-minded people.

We're focused on product categories that people are passionate about like Sports Cards, Pokemon Cards, NFTs, Sneakers and more.

Whatnot is the fastest growing marketplace ever in the United States and has raised $225M from YC, A16Z, Capital G and others.

name: Prelay
headline: Team Selling Platform
description:
Most revenue teams have difficulty getting the right team members and internal stakeholders involved in a deal at the right time which creates waste of resources, delays deals, and causes deal slippage.

With Prelay's team selling software, coordination and communication is all organized within one purpose-built platform integrated with your other key software instead of spread across multiple disjointed collaboration tools without any centralized tracking, oversight, or learnings. Not only are there fewer headaches for sales reps and their technical counterparts, but sales, presales, and revenue operations leaders have more insight into where and how resources are being used as well as how effective they are at surpassing their goals.

Prelay enables your revenue team and its internal stakeholders to coordinate and communicate effectively so you can drive more revenue faster as a team.

Prelay is also backed by top-tier investors including funds like Y Combinator, SV Angel, Liquid2 Ventures and executives from Box, Dropbox, Palantir, SAP, and Microsoft.

name: Rinse
headline: We're building the One Medical for dental
description: Rinse is building the One Medical for dental. Beautiful studios, easy to book same day appointments, and anxiety-free care focused on prevention, not the upsell.

name: Bitaccess
headline: We make bitcoin simple.
description:
We make enterprise software for crypto.

Our leading product is a Bitcoin ATM. There are over 5,000 of them across the world.

name: NewCraft
headline: Universal API for HR & Payroll
description: NewCraft makes it easy for developers to connect to employee platforms like Workday, ADP, and Paylocity with a single API. To get access to these systems, some companies have spent over $10M in development costs alongside years of business development efforts. We believe innovators can build the future of employment faster with simplified access. On top of standardizing data across employee systems into a universal API, we offer a modern developer experience with test environments, documentation, and security.

name: Tempo
headline: Live home fitness training powered by computer vision.
description: SmartSpot is a post Series-A stealth startup backed by Founders Fund and Khosla Ventures that uses computer vision to deliver an unparalleled fitness training experience to your home. Our unique hardware solution gives amazing trainers the ability to see their class participants in real time and deliver detailed advice that was previously only possible in person.

name: Jupe
headline: Jupe delivers a village on a truck anywhere on planet Earth.
description: Jupe is creating a flat-packed off-grid technology that allows a village to be set up in hours, anywhere on the planet, unlocking what was considered unusable land. With ‘skateboard chassis’ tech inspired by the electric vehicle industry, Jupe is able to flat pack and transport living units and infrastructure 100X cheaper, manufacture 30X faster, and at 10X lower cost relative to a volumetric modular ADU/living unit. ARR of $11M next year on land share model. Ultimate aim is to house 1% of the human population (100M persons) by 2050.

name: Titan
headline: Titan is the "Fidelity for millennials and Gen Z."
description: Titan is the "Fidelity for millennials and Gen Z." We build, manage, and explain investment funds via our mobile operating system. Anyone who would like Titan to invest their money can download our mobile app, link their bank, and transfer capital.  We currently have four investment strategies (3 in equities, 1 in crypto) and will be launching more. Users have described us as "a hedge fund in their pocket."

name: Quan
headline: Closes the gap between engagement surveys and wellbeing perks.
description:
By identifying the root cause of wellbeing problems, Quan points to the most effective solutions to give managers and teams the support they need.

https://www.quanwellbeing.com/

name: Bear Flag Robotics
headline: Bear Flag Robotics is developing autonomous driving technology for…
description: Bear Flag Robotics is developing autonomous driving technology for farm tractors. By equipping tractors and implements with technology, Bear Flag allows growers to automate and optimize many of their most common tasks. This addresses the farm labor shortage while removing workers from hazardous conditions. Additionally, Bear Flag provides growers with analytics that help them garner actionable insights about their crops and operations.

name: Apollo.io
headline: Apollo is the foundation of your entire go-to-market strategy.
description:
Founded in 2015, Apollo.io is a lead intelligence and sales engagement platform trusted by nearly 9,000 paying customers, from rapidly growing startups to some of the largest global enterprises. Our community-based approach to crowdsourcing data gives users maximum coverage while ensuring data accuracy. Our advanced algorithms and unique data acquisition methods help over 500,000 sales professionals enrich and analyze prospects' data to increase quality conversations and opportunities.

We have notable investors: Y Combinator and Nexus Venture Partners. We recently completed a Series B financing to fuel our next growth phase. We have reached and maintained profitability for the last 18 months.

Our growth and customer feedback set us apart from competitors.  Apollo had over one million sign-ups for its platform in the past year, and the number of weekly active users increased by over 400%.  We are a top-ranking G2 Crowd vendor in the Sales Intelligence, Lead Intelligence, Marketing Account Intelligence, and Sales Engagement categories.  Our highest scores are in the B2B data space for accuracy and ROI based on customer reviews.

name: Flowdash
headline: Quickly build internal tools for your ops team's manual workflows
description: Flowdash makes it easy to build semi-automated workflows with no code. We recognize that many business processes today simply can't be fully automated and require human intuition. But there's no reason they need to be fully manual either. With Flowdash, teams can build custom tools to manage their internal processes, leveraging automation where it makes sense, and weaving in human intuition when needed.

name: Aleph Solutions
headline: Help global brands sell on online marketplaces
description:
Aleph helps companies with thousands of products like General Motors and Bosch increase their revenue in Latin America by listing their inventory on large e-commerce sites like Mercado Libre and Amazon. Our customers sell over U$D 4M dollars’ worth of product every month using our software.

Many brands struggle with the shift to sell on marketplaces. They want resellers to be involved in their online sales strategies, but both still need to maintain 10,000 products, prices and inventory up-to-date across digital channels and Marketplaces do not provide tools to help brands and resellers on the journey.

Aleph is the best way for brands and wholesalers to replicate their offline network of resellers online. With Aleph, Brands create high-quality product catalogs to share with their resellers. Now, any seller can access their product catalogue and sell on marketplaces.

name: Nomod
headline: Square minus the hardware
description: We're building a financial operating system for forward thinking businesses. We're starting with making it incredibly easy to sign up and start accepting card payments both in-person and online. Next up, we're working on holding money, spending money, making payments, and providing fast access to credit!

name: Paperspace
headline: Paperspace is a cloud platform for individuals and businesses.
description:
Paperspace is a cloud computing company creating simple and scalable accelerated computing applications. Our goal is to allow individuals and professional teams to build applications with ease -  from Machine Learning to 3D graphics.

Paperspace is backed by leading investors including Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Battery Ventures, and Intel Capital.

Mission:
Our mission is to make cloud computing more accessible through radical simplicity, community-driven technical resources, and straightforward pricing.

--
To learn more about Paperspace, please visit https://www.paperspace.com/ or follow us on Twitter at: @hellopaperspace.

name: Clerky
headline: Makes legal paperwork easy for startups and their attorneys.
description: Clerky builds software to make legal paperwork easier for startups and their attorneys.  From formation to fundraising to hiring - everything a startup needs.  Thousands of top startups use Clerky to get legal paperwork done safely and efficiently.

name: Catena Biosciences
headline: Using protein coupling to cure autoimmune disorders.
description: Catena’s technology lets us attach any two proteins together using an enzyme -tyrosinase- and the native amino acids tyrosine and cysteine within target proteins. It is a true platform technology because it enables the joining of any two soluble proteins together with minimal engineering and without restrictions due to protein size or complexity. Our work has already been used to modify cancer specific antibodies, but the most exciting application is in the emerging field of immune tolerance induction. Catena’s technology allows us to couple receptor binding proteins to immune triggering partners, letting us retrain the immune system when it targets healthy proteins. Such treatments could effectively cure autoimmune diseases such as Multiple Sclerosis, Graves' Disease and Hashimoto's by limiting inflammation towards ankyrin, anoctamin, and other self-antigens.

name: Chaldal
description:
Chaldal.com is an online shop based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is a service rooted on the idea that shopping for necessities should not be a burden. At Chaldal, we believe that time is valuable to our fellow Dhaka residents, and that they should not have to waste hours in traffic, brave the weather and wait in line just to buy some eggs – which is why we deliver everything you need right at your door-step and at no additional cost!

Chaldal is a work in progress, and we hope to get better over time. We are firm believers in using technology to improve Bangladesh, and we will continue to invest all our effort in pushing the boundaries of technology in this country.

name: Station
headline: Your team’s automated knowledge base
description:
Station is the central interface for your team’s knowledge. Thanks to our browser extension teams easily visualize and switch across all apps, documents, notes, messages, and more.

Connect any app to Station, customize your interface and watch how Station creates links between files and highlights the information you need when you need it.
It’s a one click install.

name: BrightReps
headline: No-code workflow tool
description: At BrightReps we help Fortune 500 companies solve complex customer issues 10x faster. We replace static knowledge-base articles and training documents with a real-time workflow tool. Our customers are able to cut on-boarding time by >50% while easily automating steps at any point in their team's process. Analytics are captured automatically, so mangers can drill into exactly how each process is being used, and use data to A/B test different versions and publish continuous improvements. BrightReps is saving small companies greater than $100k annually and enterprise companies significantly more!

name: Goodkind
headline: Video messaging for B2C revenue teams
description:
Asynchronous video is quickly becoming a primary medium of communication. Yet, big businesses don't do it because trusting people on video is hard and doing this at scale is too difficult. 

Goodkind is a video messaging platform for B2C revenue teams, and we're unlocking this medium for businesses for the first time. 

Fortune 500 retailers, fintechs, and SMB SaaS companies use Goodkind to increase conversion rates by up to 5x across the customer journey. 

Goodkind is backed by Yuri Sagalov, Chris Golda and other awesome investors.

name: Priceonomics
headline: We help companies turn their data into great stories.
description:
Priceonomics is the price guide for everything.

Price guides are helpful for buying and selling used things. How much should I spend on this used bicycle on Craigslist? How much should I sell my stereo system for on eBay? Is this used Vespa a good deal, or what?

name: marketfeed
headline: App that teaches people in India how to trade stocks.
description: marketfeed is an app that teaches people in India how to trade stocks. Our users pay a subscription fee to learn directly from expert traders, and they trade stocks in our app.

name: Arengu
headline: Build frictionless signup flows in minutes
description: Arengu allows developers to build frictionless signup flows in minutes. Large companies like Airbnb, Uber or Revolut, dedicate a full engineering team to build and optimize their signup flows. Most companies cannot dedicate these resources, and Arengu helps them deliver an optimized signup flow that boosts conversion rates by 20-30%.

name: Ivy Homes
headline: We make instant offers to buy homes in India
description:
Selling a home is a super stressful affair due to the uncertainties involved. We help smoothen that process by guaranteeing a fair price and offering that value upfront for the seller. We’ve built up an information system that captures the details of all real estate transactions.
We’ve further developed a pricing model on top of it that helps determine the value of a home. We use this to offer liquidity to the seller by making an instant offer to purchase their house. We then refurb the property as necessary and further sell through our channel partners.

name: RedCarpetUp
headline: Credit cards for Indians that banks cannot see
description:
RedCarpet issues credit cards to those that banks cannot see. Currently we are one of the largest issuers of credit lines to the new-to-credit customer in India.
In a population base of 800 million people with bank accounts, there are less than 40 million credit cards. 
By building a fullstack SDK for card issuance, underwriting as well as holding capital & collection ops, we are looking to build the Capital One of India.

name: Stownest
headline: Valet Self Storage - Flexible, Full-Service Storage Spaces for INDIA
description:
Valet self-storage solution for your personal storage needs. Be it household storage or seasonal belongings, we will pick them up and store them in our facility. You get it back when you need it. 

Service built on technology and strong customer experience fundamentals.

name: Convictional
headline: Enabling every company to automate B2B trade
description: Convictional helps enterprise retailers source, onboard and transact with third party sellers.

name: Synth
headline: The easiest way to generate realistic synthetic test data for your…
description:
Synth is the easiest way to generate realistic, synthetic test data for your app.

Synth leverages cutting-edge synthetic data generation paired with entity extraction and works on-premise or in your own cloud. Synth automatically classifies PII in your schema and uses bespoke generators to generate realistic yet completely anonymous data.

name: Enerjazz
headline: Making electric vehicle batteries affordable
description:
Enerjazz is building a battery swapping network (like gasoline stations) for 2M+ commercial electric vehicles in India. We make batteries affordable for EV owners and enable them to earn 80% more. 

Every rickshaw in India will be electric (8M) because of the government not renewing licenses for gas-powered rickshaws. The charging infrastructure does not exist at home for rickshaw owners. The only way for a professional electric rickshaw driver to be profitable is to swap batteries - overnight charging is not sufficient.

name: Onebrief
headline: Onebrief makes military headquarters run seamlessly
description:
Virtually everything in the military requires a plan—from everyday operations to war-time missions. With a rigorous process, many stakeholders, and rudimentary software (PowerPoint!!), planning is very slow. 

Onebrief is a collaborative software designed to make military planning fast. It turns every input into reusable building blocks and automatically keeps all planning artifacts in sync.

name: Wildfire
headline: Social news app
description: We started Wildfire during our senior year at UC Berkeley as a safety alert app for colleges. Wildfire quickly grew beyond a campus safety tool to a social news app, which empowered people to spread the word quickly to their community when something significant happened nearby. Over six years, we've sent 65 million alerts to nearly 1 million users.

name: Cache
headline: Online convenience stores fulfilled by tiny, automated dark stores.
description: Online convenience stores on DoorDash, UberEats. We use automated dark stores to pass items to delivery drivers.

name: Comprehend
headline: SaaS to increase speed and quality of clinical trials.
description: Comprehend, the leader in Clinical Intelligence solutions, is focused on accelerating treatments to patients. Our suite of software applications provide clinical operations, data management and medical review teams with the critical insights and automation they need to improve the speed, safety and quality of their clinical trials. Designed to unify, monitor and analyze clinical data across disparate sources in real-time, Comprehend's Cloud software delivers solutions for CRO oversight, centralized monitoring, risk monitoring, data review and medical monitoring. Comprehend’s investors include Sequoia Capital, Lightspeed Venture Partners and Eminence Capital. Learn more at www.comprehend.com.

name: Slapdash
headline: Work at the speed of thought
description:
Slapdash brings all your apps together in one place to give you new superpowers. 

It's a new type of tool that makes modern computer work less tedious and more fun. It's just one neat trick: we make your workflow insanely fast.

We have built a low-latency, file-system for your cloud apps as well as the fastest interface in the world to drive it: the Command Bar.

name: CostCertified
headline: Amazon for Construction
description: We are building the Amazon for construction where contractors can give their customers an interactive shopping experience, turning the estimate into a point-of-sale, for the first time.  It is a marketplace for general contractors, subcontractors, retailers and consumers, powered by a database of over 114,000 real items.

name: BlackOakTV
headline: A video subscription platform serving black viewers and creators.
description: BlackOakTV is a subscription video platform hyper-serving black viewers and creators. We make it easy for black viewers to find, watch and engage with the content and creators that most reflect their lives and experiences.

name: Axolo
headline: Collaboration app for engineering teams
description:
Enable your team to merge pull requests faster.

When using Axolo, we consider each pull request as a small independent project that will create a temporary Slack channel where all people that take a part in it will be invited. Each Github’s notifications & actions will then be sent directly to this channel.

name: Luminate Medical
headline: Developing a medical device to prevent chemotherapy induced hair loss.
description: Luminate Medical is developing a medical device that helps cancer patients prevent chemotherapy induced hair loss in a comfortable and portable way. Over 1.1M US patients receive chemotherapy treatments causing hair loss each year, creating a $1.7B market in the US alone. To date, we've used our novel compression therapy to prevent hair loss in a 120 animal study, and completed a clinical study showing our device works with healthy volunteers. Our team includes a Thiel Fellow, and a Biomedical Electronic Engineering PhD who has led clinical trials for breast cancer patients.

name: Shogun
headline: Shogun empowers brands to create exceptional ecommerce experience.
description:
Shogun is an ecommerce experience platform empowering brands to drive higher conversions, revenue, and brand loyalty. Our products Shogun Page Builder and Shogun Frontend help teams build and optimize their online stores to deliver exceptional experiences. Our products integrate with ecommerce platforms like Shopify and BigCommerce, and our 18,000 customers include Leesa, MVMT, Timbuk2, and Chubbies. Visit www.getshogun.com for more.

We're an inclusive, remote, diverse, and globally distributed team. And we’re hiring!

name: Salt Security
headline: Protects organizations from getting breached through their APIs.
description:
Salt Security protects the APIs that form the core of every modern application. Its API Protection Platform is the industry’s first patented solution to prevent the next generation of API attacks, using machine learning and AI to automatically and continuously identify and protect APIs. 

Deployed in minutes, the Salt Security platform learns the granular behavior of a company’s APIs and requires no configuration or customization to pinpoint and block API attackers. 

Salt Security was founded in 2016 by alumni of the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) and serial entrepreneur executives in the cybersecurity field and is based in Silicon Valley and Israel.

name: Truebill
headline: Live your best financial life
description:
Truebill is a leading personal finance app that analyzes members' spending habits, identifies inefficiencies, and offers immediate methods to improve their financial health. It enables people to optimize their spending, manage subscriptions, lower their bills, and automatically set aside money to reach their savings goals. Truebill has saved members more than $100 million since 2016 and is headquartered in Silver Spring, Maryland, with offices in San Francisco. 

Truebill's mission is to empower people to live their best financial lives. Truebill offers members a unique understanding of their finances and a suite of valuable services that save them time and money - ultimately giving them a leg up on their financial journey. 

Truebill is backed by Accel, Bessemer Venture Partners, Eldridge Industries, and YCombinator.

name: DigitalBrain
headline: Superhuman for customer support agents
description: We are Digital Brain. An external layer on-top of existing helpdesks to get through support tickets twice as fast.

name: Secoda
headline: The second brain for your data team
description:
Secoda is a universal data discovery and documentation tool that makes finding metadata, queries, charts and documentation as easy as a google search.

Today, data teams are collecting tons of data, but most employees don't know what data exists, how to use it, and what data to trust. This confusion happens because different components of company data get collected in fragmented tools. Teams use dbt and Snowflake for data cataloging, Google Sheets for events, Confluence for general knowledge, Slack to manage data requests, Mode for reports, Github, Looker, the list goes on and on.

Secoda lets teams manage their queries, charts, data catalog, data dictionary, and documentation in one place.

After teams switch to Secoda, data knowledge is centralized in one place. Instead of having to switch between Snowflake, dbt, Confluence Google Sheets, BI tool, and your query editor, Secoda keeps all your data knowledge in one place for everyone who needs it.

name: Lawn Love
headline: Modern, on-demand lawn care service. Get a quote in two minutes.
description:
We're Lawn Love, a new type of lawn care service. We’re building a software layer on top of the very large and largely low-tech lawn care market. We solve two core problems:
 
For consumers: Lawn Love is a modern, seamless lawn care experience. Gone are the days of physical, in-person estimates, payments left under the doormat, and spotty service. We use a combination of high-resolution satellite imagery, public and private data sets, and human review to generate a personalized quote for your yard – all in under two minutes and without ever setting foot on your property.
 
From there, you are paired with a skilled lawn pro who will show up and complete the work. You can coordinate everything from your smartphone or web browser, and the entire experience is streamlined and delightful.
 
For lawn pros: We start by bringing a pipeline of new customers straight to your door. No more spending hours hanging door hangers or dealing with snake-oil SEO salespeople. Just pick up whatever jobs you want, fill out your schedule, and you’re good to go. We also handle all the customer service, accounting, and collections; freeing you up to spend less time on the back-office work and more time in the field earning money. And that’s just the start: Our advanced job clustering and routing algorithms help build you much denser routes, allowing you to do up to twice as many jobs per day while slashing your fuel expenses and idle time.
 
In short, we’re democratizing software that was previously only available to large companies in the space, and giving small business owners tools to operate more efficiently and better compete with the big guys.

name: Brite
headline: Software that helps employees pick their employee benefits.
description: We are building a benefits marketplace for employers to purchase and compare benefits by industry and company size. We are currently a decision support tool for employees to select the best benefit package.

name: Epinoma
headline: We engineer proteins that control the operating system of biology.

name: Giveffect
headline: Fundraising, Volunteer and Donor Management SaaS for nonprofits.
description: Giveffect provides a powerful all-in-one software platform exclusively for nonprofits. We offer fundraising, events, online donations, volunteer management, donor management, marketing, constituent relationship management software, and more. We are well positioned for rapid expansion in the coming years and have garnered top industry recognition for our platform.

name: OneShop
headline: Reseller groups and tools
description: OneShop is where resellers bond over work. Thousands of resellers run their business with our tools and share how business is going.

name: Instacrops
headline: We help farmers maximize crop yields in LATAM.
description:
Instacrops is a simple dashboard that helps farmers maximize their crop yields. 

We give farmers IoT sensors to put in their field. We combine that data with satellite and drone data to provide analytics on the health of their farms. Farmers use this to increase their crops yield by 22% on average. 

We’re live on 280 farms across Latam and have reached more than $200.000 in monthly revenue, growing 41% month over month. 

There’s 2.9 billion acres of farmland in Latin America which makes this a $50 billion market.

We’re instacrops. We’re bringing data driven decisions to farmers worldwide

name: Quest
headline: Audio answers to career questions
description: Quest is a Q&A app where experts answer questions in short audio clips. We’re starting with career advice, hosting founders and operators from YC and companies like Google, who share intimate and personal stories about work you've never heard before.

name: Juniper
headline: Software stack for behavioral health, starting with autism
description: We're building behavioral health practice management software that solves the logistical pain points many clinics have today and helps them scale in the future. Essentially, our solution is an IT backbone that seamlessly integrates everything from patient onboarding to billing and everything in between, with an emphasis on integration with 3rd-party apps -- replacing the manual effort that clinicians waste time on today.

name: WorkClout
headline: Safety & quality software for industrial sectors.
description:
WorkClout is enabling industrial labor to perform to their highest potential. 

WorkClout is a tool that helps industrial Operations & HR Teams make better decisions to improve production efficiency. WorkClout's SaaS tool centralizes on-the-job employee training, troubleshooting, safety/quality procedures, knowledge building, and performance tracking.

name: SolarMente
headline: Sunrun for Europe
description:
We integrate solar, storage and energy trading for each home in one smart solution via our software platform. We’re starting in Spain which has the highest potential for solar and one of the lowest market penetration in Europe (0.1%). 
We are doing $100k in monthly revenue, we’ve grown 300% since YC started and are breaking even. 
We will help 5M Spanish homeowners produce, store and distribute their clean energy ($50B market). We are backed by GFC, Liquid2 Ventures, Soma Capital, Y Combinator and other investors including Atomico angels.

name: Gobillion
headline: Pinduoduo for India
description: Gobillion is the Pinduoduo for India, we make e-commerce social by enabling customers to buy together in groups and get great deals!

name: Identitypass
headline: Compliance and Security infrastructure for Africa
description: We are making it possible for digital businesses in Africa to easily verify their customers within seconds.

name: Vue Storefront
headline: Frontend Platform for eCommerce
description:
Vue Storefront is a Frontend Platform (Head) for Headless commerce. Available as Open Source & Enterprise. By implementing Vue Storefront, you will improve your overall User Experience and lift up your revenues but at least 20%. 

1. Lightning Fast
We are on the mission to improve loading times for eCommerce users, especially on mobile devices. We want to make sure, that every site using Vue Storefront will load in under 2 seconds for all users across the globe. Currently, it is their weak spot:  
a) It takes, on average, 15.3 seconds to fully load a mobile page. 
b) 75% of mobile sites take longer than 10 seconds to load.  
c) 53% of mobile site visits are abandoned if it takes longer than 3 seconds to load. 

Loading times mean better User Experience and this leads to eCommerce users buying more, giving better conversion rates:  
a) Walmart found that for every 1 second improvement in page load time, conversions increased by 2%  
b) Increase of conversion % at each stage of Customer Buying Journey at eCommerce based on 0.1s improvement based on Google Research (https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/future-of marketing/creativity/mobile-page-speed-data/) 

2. Fast Time To Value
Vue Storefront is the glue for headless commerce,  giving merchants the ability to connect with any eCommerce backend, any CMS or any other 3rd party service, as we provide those API’s by default in our cloud platform.  This is saving our clients thousands of development hours. 

Also, because of the Progressive Web App features that we provide, there is no need to build native iOS or Android apps - everything is available through the web. In combination with frontend components provided out of the box, it is possible to build a new eCommerce frontend within weeks, not months. 

3. Fast content adjustments  with any Headless CMS
Headless CMS is the only way to embrace omnichannel sales, and we know it. That is why the Enterprise version of Vue Storefront delivers the API-first setup of integrations with the best Headless CMSes out-of-the-box. 

It allows business users to edit the content & publish with no-code approach

4. Fast learning curve for developers  
We use the modern tech stack that is easily adaptable by the developer community, and what is better market proof than the popularity of our Open Source Project? We are currently 5th most popular eCommerce framework globally and the 1st Frontend eCommerce Framework globally!
https://docs.vuestorefront.io/v2/
https://www.vuestorefront.io/

name: Epihub
headline: Epihub is Shopify for anyone teaching online 👩‍💻👨‍💻
description: Epihub offers educators an all-in-one platform for scheduling, billing, and teaching online. Epihub blends eight products together, including a webpage builder and website embed, CRM, custom intake forms, scheduler for appointments, virtual event management, virtual classroom, payment processing for invoices and credits, plus paystubs and progress reports.

name: Nestor
headline: Intelligent employee coaching tool
description:
Our mission is to help people work better, happier and with purpose. Nestor started in 2018 with a vision to help people reach their full potential in the workplace while driving business growth.

Nestor is an employee coaching tool. It helps managers with actionable insights on how to coach their people for performance, enhance a leadership culture, and helps business owners increase transparency, productivity, and accountability in their teams. Nestor’s holistic approach improves the employee experience, well-being, and personal growth while driving Culture-ROI and business growth at scale.

Nestor redefines performance management. Managers and employees, together, commit to the company’s purpose and culture, and through Nestor, they can consistently align role-specific expectations with the business’ strategic direction. Nestor integrates emotional intelligence measurement tools and business intelligence, based on a proprietary software solution to connect performance, coaching, and innovation.

Get a demo here: https://nestorup.com/demo.

name: Mednet
headline: Network of doctors helping each other treat cancer
description: The Mednet is a community of physicians helping each other treat patients with cancer.Their Mission is Improve knowledge sharing between physicians so that patients get high quality care wherever they are treated.They help physicians get answers to questions where there is no clear answer in guidelines or published research and expert opinion is necessary. All answers are indexed and searchable so that every physician can quickly access expert knowledge to provide their patients with high quality care.

name: Flowbo
headline: Pipe for creators
description: Flowbo is an exchange connecting investors to online creators like YouTube and Instagram. We package assets of creators into investable products so creators can raise money. For example, we package creators' receivables into factoring products. We create new asset classes for the new economy.

name: enable.us (formerly Referenceable)
headline: All-in-one buyer & seller enablement platform for B2B Virtual Selling
description:
Enable.us is an all-in-one workspace for the B2B Sales, Marketing, and Customer facing teams to provide a personalized and interactive buying and onboarding experience to their prospective customers. Customer facing teams have everything they need in one single location to:

- Capture Video/Audio Product demos, customer references, sales decks, white-papers, contracts, onboarding material, and other content 

- Automatically organize & contextualize  (by industry, persona, deal stage, deal size)

- Build personalized deal rooms with AI-targeted content,  simplified workflows, and 1:1 communication with the prospect and other stakeholders/influencers.

Learn more about our launch here https://www.producthunt.com/posts/referenceable or sign up here  https://www.enable.us/

name: Levo
headline: Levo is a high yield savings account for Mexico
description: Levo is a high yield savings account for Mexico. We aggregate the savings accounts of our users and negotiate significantly better interest rates from other banks on their behalf. There are $65b in savings for which we charge 1.5%, making this a $1b opportunity only in Mexico. The company is founded by Salvador Rivero, former Equities VP Portfolio Manager for BBVA, for which he invested $1.5b USD in Mexico and Latam; and Max Merghentaler 3x founder and CTO of 2 ML companies. To date we have $300k USD AuM, growing at 28% w/w, 64% client retention and 2,516% net AuM retention, we have LOIs with 3 banks. Our main investors are Y Combinator, Magma Partners, Latitud and BackBone Ventures.

name: DreamCraft Entertainment, Inc.
headline: Platform that allows anyone to create and monetize video games.
description: DreamCraft enables anyone to create, publish, and monetize video games. The company’s core product is a code-free game creation platform, bundled with high quality art assets. DreamCraft is backed by March Capital, Makers Fund, Tencent Corporation, Y Combinator, and other top investors in the gaming space. The company was founded in 2018 and now has a global team of 20+ people with half remote and half based in Silicon Valley.

name: LendUp
headline: LendUp is a socially responsible company on a mission to redefine…
description:
Could a fintech company be built that helps people today, and prepares them for tomorrow? One that offers consumers high quality, mobile-first credit and savings products and protects them from tricks and traps? That’s LendUp. LendUp's mission is to provide anyone with a better path to financial health. 

We believe there are two types of financial products: chutes and ladders. Ladders help people up, chutes push people down. One of our core values is that every product we offer at LendUp is a ladder, measured by the long-term financial well-being of our customers. LendUp credit cards, loans, and savings resources reflect our commitment to getting our customers to a better financial state.

We are a data-driven company and build all of our technology in-house. With a firm belief that you're more than your credit score, we're extending credit as aggressively as possible and helping solve for the income volatility and financial instability that affects more than 140 million Americans. 

We are backed by more than $325 million in debt and equity financing from investors such as GV, PayPal, Y Combinator, QED Investors, Susa Ventures, Data Collective, Thomvest Ventures, Kleiner Perkins, Kapor Capital, Bronze Investments, radicle impact, Victory Park Capital, Reddit co-founder Alexis Ohanian, Gmail founder Paul Buchheit, Troy Carter, and many others.

One of our values is "different backgrounds, same mission."​ We come from venerable Silicon Valley technology companies, major banks, nonprofits and law firms. We're former consumer advocates, regulators and academics. Together, we're bringing our mission to life. Join us!

name: Meticulous
headline: Software to catch bugs in web apps with zero-effort from developers.
description: Meticulous is a tool to catch bugs in web applications with zero-effort from developers. Insert a single line of JavaScript onto your site, and we record thousands of real user sessions. We then test your new code by replaying those user sessions to automatically find bugs for you before they hit production.

name: Circa
headline: Event marketing CRM
description: Circa is the event marketing platform built for demand gen and field marketing teams. We help sales and marketing teams work on events, everywhere and every way their customers gather.

name: Glitzi
headline: At-home spa, beauty & grooming services marketplace for LatAm
description: Glitzi provides at-home spa, beauty and grooming services for people in Latin America. We do this by connecting you to our network of high quality masseuses, manicurists and barbers.

name: Pyxai
headline: Video interviewing platform infused with soft skills & culture values
description: We help companies identify top talent and reduce turnovers with our socially conscious video interviewing technology. Our video interviewing platform is infused with a soft skill and culture value assessments to supercharge the hiring process. Better hires mean companies can increase team efficiency and productivity which leads to faster growth.

name: Revel
headline: The modern community for women over 40
description: Revel is building the modern community for women over age 40. We are backed by Forerunner Ventures and Y Combinator and were recently named one of the Most Innovative Companies of 2020 by Fast Company.

name: Paladin Cyber
headline: Empowering every organization to be cyber resilient
description:
Paladin helps organizations protect their teams, systems, and data from cybercriminals.

Whether you have a part-time IT person or an entire security team, Shield helps to reduce the risk of falling victim to ransomware and other cybercrime. We fortify the entry points cybercriminals use to gain access to your network and build a human firewall with a cyber-aware team.

Our easy-to-use security solution is powered by proprietary AI that identifies malicious emails & web traffic, monitors systems for vulnerabilities and indicators of compromise, and automates security training with employee-specific training modules.

name: Novel
headline: U.S. business formation for international founders
description: Jumpstart makes it easy for international entrepreneurs to start and manage their U.S. company. As a non-resident, you can use Jumpstart to file your business, tax ID, and bank account so you can access U.S. business services like Stripe, PayPal, credit cards, loans and more.

name: Dime
headline: Turn your content into unique digital collectibles.
description: Dime lets creators turn their content into unique digital collectibles. Fans can buy items from their favorite artists, trade them on our marketplace, and display their collections on our site. Under the hood everything is secured using NFTs, but we take care of all of that. For creators it’s just like Patreon--except fans get to own a unique digital item in exchange for their support.

name: Queue
headline: Find, hire, and collaborate with vetted product designers.
description:
Queue is a SAAS enabled marketplace that lets you hire and collaborate with designers for contract work. 

We vet every designer on our marketplace and provide collaboration tools that lets you get the best outcome possible.

name: Indivio
headline: Customize videos to be more relevant and improve business outcomes.
description: Indivio's video creative automation capabilities enable modern marketing teams to more easily deliver dynamic video experiences that improve business outcomes.

name: Parker
headline: Parker is a digital bank.
description: Parker is a digital bank.

name: BukuWarung
headline: Accounting & Payments app for 60M micro-businesses in Indonesia
description:
BukuWarung is SEA's fastest growing startup and we are building digital infrastructure for 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia. BukuWarung's vision is to empower 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using our technology platform, starting with bookkeeping, online storefront and payments.

BukuWarung has raised $80M from top tier VCs globally: Peter Thiel's Valar Ventures, Goodwater Capital, Y-Combinator, Rocketship.vc, AC Ventures, Quona Capital, East Ventures, Golden Gate Ventures, SoftBank Partners, DST Global Partners, and strategic angel investors from Stripe, PayPal, Plaid, Grab, Gojek, Facebook, AirBnB, Fast, Mastercard.

headline: Analytics stack for omnichannel retailers and brands
description:
42 is an end-to-end analytics stack for DTC and wholesale brands.

Our platform shows you the right insights and data, anytime you need them:
- Hundreds of built-in metrics across Stores, eComm, Wholesale, or any other channel
- See all your sales, stock and customer in one report, with images
- Accurate cost, markdown and promo reporting
- Get answers in real-time, during your buyer / supplier meetings
- Get your store managers to use data, we've seen 10% margin increases from this
- Actually know how much stock you have.

We're more than just a dashboard...
- No infrastructure needed. We do the hosting and maintenance.
- No integrations (for you). We do the heavy-lifting and get your data into 42
- For brands, we work with all the major retailers (via xlsx, portals or EDI)
- For retailers, we can be your vendor portal
- We integrate with any system
- We work with you to tailor the analytics according to your products and naming

Our customers include AllSaints, Frasers Group, Incipio Group, Bandier, Deconic... and way more.

If you want to learn more about what we do, head over to our website: 42technologies.com
... or go to any AllSaints store and ask a store manager :)

name: Duffel
headline: APIs for searching, booking, and managing flights.
description: We offer the most powerful and intuitive tools for starting and growing a travel business. With Duffel, you can search, book and manage flights across more than 20 airlines. All through one single platform.

name: BlaBla Live
headline: A game-changer for online learning
description: Practice English speaking 10X faster through fun and easy 1v1 or 1v4 audio chat rooms or short videos from native speakers! BlaBla is your fun, convenient, free app to enjoy an immersive English learning environment with endless topics, 12000+ video lessons, audio chatrooms, and more!

name: Pipekit
headline: Pipekit scales data pipelines for enterprises
description: Our app manages Argo Workflows for data teams, enabling complex data pipelines in half the time while saving companies hundreds of thousands of dollars annually. Argo Workflows is an open-source, data pipeline framework for Kubernetes that’s used in production by Bloomberg, New Relic, NVIDIA, and many other open-source early adopters.

name: Portão 3
headline: Corporate travel and expenses product for LATAM
description:
Portão 3 is a corporate travel and expenses product for LATAM with over U$ 24k in revenue.

We are disrupting the 11,000+ corporate travel agents in LATAM that do not invest in technology. 

We generated over 1.2M in GTV in July, even during the COVID pandemic. We are also at breakeven now.

The company is founded by Fernando, second-time entrepreneur with past successful exit and ex-CPO of large IT consulting firms in Brazil and Bianca, experienced entrepreneurs in the travel and growth industry.

name: Kalam Labs
headline: STEM Learning via live-gameplay
description: At Kalam Labs we teach 6 to 14 year old kids their favourite science topics via live gaming. Kids spend upto 3 hours per week learning topics like- Space, Black Holes and Dinosaurs.

name: MarqVision
headline: We help global brands remove counterfeits from online marketplaces.
description: MarqVision helps global brands take down counterfeits from online marketplaces (think: Amazon + Alibaba). MarqVision uses AI-powered anti-counterfeiting software to automate the detection and reporting of counterfeits. Fueled by e-commerce and social media, counterfeiting is the largest criminal enterprise in the world, with annual sales surpassing $2 trillion last year.
