Founded by Harvard Law Students and backed by Softbank and Y Combinator, MarqVision raised a $5 million seed round and reached $1 million in ARR since launching in November 2020. (HQ: Los Angeles)

name: Legion Health
headline: B2B Mental Health Marketplace
description: Legion Health sells psychiatrists' and therapists' time by the hour. Mental health professionals sign up to work extra shifts on top of their regular workload, and telehealth companies, hospitals, and other health care organizations can scale their mental health offerings more quickly by not needing to hire these professionals full time.

name: Unravel Carbon
headline: Enterprise software for companies to track & reduce their carbon…
description: We enable enterprises decarbonize their networks of SMEs (suppliers, customers, partners), with speed and at scale with rigorous data science, consumer-grade product and deep climate expertise. Our founders have developed public sector and private sector climate change strategies, Goldman Sachs' global credit derivatives risk platform  and invested in multiple startups.

name: Mentum
headline: Investment management API for fintechs in LATAM
description:
Mentum is an API that allows fintechs in LATAM to offer investment services to their end-users. We offer access to the US and local stock markets and simplify account opening, funding, management, and reporting of investment portfolios. Our platform reduces costs, accelerates time to market, and allows you to stay fully compliant with local regulations.

We are on a mission to improve financial inclusion in Latin America and facilitate access to wealth-creation services that are currently inaccessible to the majority of the population.

name: TrackChain
headline: Reinventing Truck Freight Brokerage in Latam
description:
Truck freight marketplace for local and cross-border shipments with last-generation tech, data, and financial services.

TrackChain reinventing old-fashioned logistics processes by digitizing and automating freight procurement & shipments management, users can log in to the platform to get instant rates & booking, for spot market and contract freight, which is smartly matched with the reliable Carriers network on TrackChain. They can use financial services to optimized payments, route planning with live shipment tracking using GPS/ELD information, digital documents, and performance analytics, an local & cross-border logistics solution in one place.

We are taking logistics in a new direction by building the most efficient, secure, and low-carbon digital freight network in Latam.

name: Soteris
headline: Building a first-of-its-kind data platform for commercial insurance.
description: Soteris is a YC-backed company with a five-person team and a great investor base building a first-of-its-kind data platform for commercial insurance.  Our goal is to organize and structure the universe of data within commercial insurance, to drastically improve the experience and efficiency for everyone involved in a commercial insurance transaction.  In just a few months, we’ve signed a half-dozen agencies that collectively write over $500 million of insurance premium per year.

name: Bumpline
headline: Captain Tailor is the Uber for tailoring.

name: Pluggy
headline: Plaid for Brazil: we allow developers to access users' financial data
description:
Pluggy is a B2B Fintech that allows any developer to connect to the data from their users' bank and broker accounts, essentially Plaid for Brazil. 

We are 100% focused in Brazil. One of the largest markets in the world. Its complexity, risks and challenges require its own solution.

Local focus and our deep experience in banking tech engineering allowed Pluggy to create a product that is considered by our customers as the only one to provide reliable data at the right time to market.

We currently cover 90% of the bank accounts in Brazil a market of more than 7 billion USD. 

We are Pluggy!

name: Infina
headline: Robinhood of Vietnam (retail investing app)
description:
We are the Robinhood of Vietnam, a retail investing app designed for younger investors.

Since launch in Jan, we have achieved rapid growth selling mutual funds and fixed income products.  We are launching stock trading in Q4 2021, and crypto in the second half of next year.

We’re the right team to build this company. I was previously with IDG Ventures, investing in Vietnam and South East Asia from 2008 to 2014.  Then I founded Lana, Reddit of Vietnam, which was acquired by LINE corporation in 2017.  

Just like Robinhood in the US, investing apps are seeing explosive growth in many markets around the world, and this wave is coming to Vietnam. There is a growing middle class who are hungry to invest in assets like stocks and crypto. We are building Infina to capture this huge opportunity to democratize investing in South East Asia.

name: Genomelink
headline: DNA App Store
description:
Genomelink is a DNA App Store. If you got DNA tested from companies like 23andMe/Ancestry, you can transfer your DNA data to Genomelink and unlock hundreds of unique apps like:
🧬Global ancestry report that goes deeper than 23andMe.
🧬More varieties of body and mind traits analysis than that are available on Ancestry.

Team:
Tomo from M3, Inc. ($70B medical platform), Yuta from MyCode (#1 consumer genetic testing in Japan), Ken from Sony (tech & bio-info lead at a joint venture between Illumina and Sony), and Carlos Bustamante, P.I. from Stanford University. The investor and affiliates include Y Combinator (S21), Sompo (Top insurance CVC in Japan, led deals for Palantir and Noom), Sony, Berkeley SkyDeck, and StartX.

name: Here
headline: Personal, Shareable, Flexible Video Rooms
description: Here is a next generation video communication platform where teams and friends create personal, shareable and flexible video rooms.  We do this by providing a real-time, shared space where people meetup to video chat, write, draw, screenshare, decorate and move around--all in a browser.

name: Synder
headline: Easy accounting for e-commerce
description: Synder is an easy accounting platform focused on e-commerce.  It connects all sales platforms (like Shopify, Stripe, Amazon or Etsy) into one ecosystem, providing businesses with consolidated cash flow, automated accounting, and inventory management making Synder a single source of truth of the correct analytics, accounting and tax filing.

name: Abhi
headline: Abhi is Pakistan's 1st financial wellness platform focusing on…
description: An early wage access platform allowing salaried employees to draw down a percentage of their accrued salary before the next payroll cycle. Helping employees to avoid late payment fee on bills, access emergency cash and substitute expensive debt. We work on a B2B2C model allowing companies to extend the product as a benefits program to their employee base.

name: Soraban
headline: Modern back-office platform for accounting firms
description: Soraban helps accounting firms automate client onboarding and data entry. Our software connects with many of the major accounting software and removes much of the manual work

name: Intellect
headline: A modern-day mental health company for Asia.
description:
Intellect is a modern-day mental health company on a mission to make mental healthcare & wellbeing support accessible for everyone in Asia.

Today, Intellect is the largest and fastest growing mental health tech company in Asia, serving over 2.5 million members and leading organisations globally through our mental health platform. Intellect was also selected as one of Google’s Best Apps of 2020.

Intellect is backed by leading investors including Insignia Ventures Partners, Y Combinator, and an extensive list of family offices, big tech executives & renowned angel investors.

name: MadEats
headline: Online delivery-only restaurant group in the Philippines
description:
MadEats is an online delivery-only restaurant group in the Philippines, building affordable, high margin food brands by using our own ghost kitchens. 

Since we use ghost kitchens, we don’t have to spend for expensive dining areas and wait staff. We can spend more money on growing our food brands, better food, and making better delivery experiences.

name: Filta
headline: The Face Filter NFT Marketplace
description: Filta is the face filter NFT marketplace being built by veterans from Pixar/Oculus/Facebook. We partner with creators to release limited-edition filters for their fans to use on social media. It turns out: the face filters you see everywhere on Snapchat and Instagram are created by independent artists - not by the platforms. These artists ALMOST NEVER get money for their work - which is insane! Filta fixes this by giving these creators a marketplace and the best filter creation tool anywhere. Interested in working on the future of digital fashion, AR/VR, and web3? Hit us up. We're hiring.

name: Shef
headline: Airbnb for Food
description:
At Shef, we're bringing the sharing economy to the table. We believe in providing our Shefs (refugees, immigrants, stay-at-home parents) the opportunity to make a meaningful income from their very own kitchens. We also believe that every person should have access to a healthy, homemade meal at an affordable price. Building a safe and happy community devoted to economic empowerment and cultural inclusivity -- that's why we started Shef.

Join us: https://jobs.lever.co/shef

name: Concord Materials
headline: Automating procurement for construction companies
description: SaaS automation tools, financing and marketplace for bulk construction materials

name: Litnerd
headline: Teaching 37M students to read with live-stream actors
description:
Litnerd is an online reading program that brings K-5 books to life by streaming live actors in the classroom. We blend the creator economy to traditional education, complete with ebooks and lesson plans. Litnerd will teach the 37 Million elementary school students in America how to read. 

Today schools spend approx. $20 Billion on reading and supplemental education programs. Yet 42% of their students still cannot read by 4th grade.

Litnerd is a contracted vendor with the largest education district in America, New York City Department of Education. Our program is currently implemented as designated classroom reading time across public schools. We have been growing aggressively at 60% MoM, used by over 14,000 paying students and hit $110K in ARR in less than 5 months.

name: Reploy
headline: Instant, shareable staging environments
description: Reploy makes it dead simple to generate full-stack staging environments or “previews” of web apps on every pull request. This helps teams move faster by sharing changes instantly, with everyone!

name: REPROSENT
headline: Helping patients fight cancer with their own data.
description: REPROSENT is an app that tracks a cancer patient's daily symptoms and uses this data to produce reports that are sent to their oncologist. Today, half of patient symptoms are missed during treatment. REPROSENT provides this key missing information, enabling the oncologist to provide better care.

name: idemeum
headline: Passwordless application management platform.
description:
idemeum is a Passwordless Application Management platform. Our vision is to provide a single place for small and medium businesses (SMBs) to set up and manage employee access to SaaS apps.

Behind the scenes we connect to any HR system and automate employee onboarding and account provisioning. Employees leverage mobile device biometrics to access any type of app - free or paid. 

Instead of deploying multiple tools for SSO, password management, and passwordless access, idemeum offers one platform to do it all.

name: Veryfi, Inc.
headline: Find Meaning in Unstructured Finance Documents in Seconds.
description:
Veryfi is a Data Transformation Platform turning Documents into Data in Seconds with Accuracy & Speed Surpassing Humans.

Veryfi gives you a fully integrated suite of data transformation products for you to securely capture, extract and transform bills, receipts and invoices into structured data for use in your app, website or backoffice. To learn more https://www.veryfi.com/

ITS TIME TO BUILD
Veryfi's developer friendly toolkits enable superior products that automate Expense Management, AP/Bill Pay, Bookkeeping and provide consumer spend behavior in Market Research

Invoices, Bills & POs
10 mins of data entry per invoice? No way! 5 seconds and it's done. Untap a goldmine of data down to line-items.

Expense Receipts
No more painful data entry for expense reimbursement. Bonus: comply with new data privacy regulations.

FMCG/CPG Receipts
Data is the new oil. Understand consumer spend across retail from SKUs in seconds.

Hotel Folios
Supercharge your travel & expense management product with a wealth of data minus the tedious data entry.

W-2 Tax Form β
Extract every drop of tax data from W2s in seconds. Including handwritten notes, checkboxes and multi-lines.

Cards β
Capture and extract data Credit Cards, Business Cards and Healthcare Insurance Cards in seconds.

More: https://www.veryfi.com/

name: Substack
headline: A place for independent writing.
description:
Start a newsletter. Build your community. Make money from subscriptions.

Publishing is free, with no limits. We only make money when you do.

name: Akute Health
headline: A medical record system for digital health companies.
description:
Akute Health makes an electronic medical record (EMR) system used by digital health companies to track patients. Our EMR is a web app used daily by clinical teams at digital health companies similar to Ro, Hims, and One Medical.

In 2015, I was diagnosed with cancer and spent 9 months in the hospital. While in the hospital, I built an app to track my own records. I needed something that was simple to use and allowed me to easily track & trend different types of data.

I later turned that app into a full medical record system. We now have over 40 customers and 20k patient records. We've also grown revenue 4x this year and have continued net negative churn. One of our customers has raised over $100M and as they grow, we will grow with them.

We are building the de facto EMR for digital health companies.

name: Pillar
headline: Where creators earn revenue promoting the products they love.
description: Pillar is how creators earn money promoting the brands and products they love. With thousands of top brands to choose from, Pillar lets creators monetize authentically. It’s the future of creator income and the ultimate link-in-bio. Build your personal website, partner with brands instantly, and start tracking what matters. Creators and their teams love Pillar because it helps them build their empire while they focus on content.

name: Matidor.com
headline: Project management on a live map
description:
Matidor is a project management software for projects where you need to see what's happening live on a map. Since our launch 9 months ago, we have done $80k ARR and started 5 enterprise pilots that will represent another 500k ARR within the next 6 months. Natural resources companies such as Petronas and GHD manage their environmental activities across thousands of locations. Instead of switching between spreadsheets, they need to visualize their projects on a map and zoom into each one of them for details such as site drawings, tasks, costs and communications.
https://matidor.com

name: Memora Health
headline: Digitize and Automate Complex Care Workflows
description: Memora Health helps healthcare organizations digitize and automate complex care workflows, making them simple for patients and clinicians to navigate. Memora ingests existing data on clinical workflows, converts them into cohesive messaging journeys that guide patients through their care episodes, and automates the completion of simple follow-up tasks in the EMR. Memora's platform reduces care team notifications by nearly 40%, has a >70 average NPS, and has improved clinical outcomes across various populations. Contact us at info@memorahealth.com

name: Rosebud AI
headline: Generative AI Studio for NFTs
description: Rosebud is building the synthetic media platform for web3. Our creators are making composable assets for web3 world building.

name: Inscribe
headline: Risk Ops Automation
description:
At Inscribe, we’re on a mission to create a fair and efficient financial services industry, starting with automating document reviews. We want to achieve this by building the most trusted automation software for financial services companies

We are based in San Francisco, CA and Dublin, Ireland. We are backed by top Silicon Valley investors including Y Combinator, Foundry Group, Crosslink Capital, Uncork Capital, and SV Angel.

name: Leena AI
headline: We at Leena AI build a virtual assistant that answers employee's HR…
description:
HR professionals spend 50% of their time answering employees' questions. It’s even worse on the employee side, they have to wait for a long time for simple answers.

In the last 12 months we have been growing 40% MoM & are currently doing more thank $1mn in ARR. We’re profitable.

We are live with 50 customers like Coca-Cola. Coca-Cola has been using us in multiple countries & spreading our product internally across more geographies. 

Leena AI consumes company’s HR information & starts answering all HR questions just like a human would. It can even answer complex personalized questions like Why is my salary less this month?.

Employees can access Leena AI from commonly used UIs like Outlook or Slack.

This is a global opportunity. Our target market is companies with more than 1000 employees. There are 120M employees in our target market. We currently charge $25/employee/year in subscription which brings us to a total market of $3B.

The founding team consists of IIT Delhi graduates.

name: Makani Science
headline: Reinventing respiration monitoring
description:
Makani Science is a medical device company based in Irvine, California. We have created the world's first wireless patch that can accurately and continuously monitor breathing. The company is co-founded by Dr. Michelle Khine and Dr. Michael Chu, two experts in the wearable monitoring space from the University of California, Irvine. 

The Makani Science system will collect unique breathing waveforms from patients in everyday environments to create the first large database of respiratory patterns associated with different diseases. Data will be collected through systems sold to our initial beachhead market, where we will help improve monitoring safety in patients being sedated for medical procedures. Our long-term goal is to combine machine learning with this database to identify and predict respiratory complications for different patient populations. 

We have a highly experienced team and will be FDA cleared in our beachhead market within a year.

name: webapp.io
headline: Full-stack review environments for every pull request
description:
Merge changes in hours instead of days. Webapp.io embeds new full-stack review environments directly into every pull request.

If your team is building a webapp + using github/gitlab/bitbucket, please reach out!s

name: Bonsai
headline: The all-in-one solution for the world's best freelancers.
description: Bonsai’s all-in-one product suite with smart automation lets people focus on their passion, not their paperwork.  Our mission is to enable anyone, anywhere in the world to work for themselves.

name: Filadd
headline: We help students in Latin America graduate from College.
description: With online courses, we help students graduate from University, starting from the admissions and throughout their entire college education until they graduate. All our courses include 24/7 interaction with our Tutors and Teachers making 95% of our users reach their desire score. We have prepared more than 10,000 students and in 2021 we have already made 800K which means 6X Year-over-Year growth.

name: Amenli
headline: Offers insurance to customers in a convenient & transparent way
description: Amenli is the first licensed online insurance broker in Egypt. Egypt has one of the lowest insurance penetrations in the world with a 100m population and a $2B GWP market growing 20+% YoY and a potential TAM of $10B. Over the past few months, Amenli issued 500+ policies in less than 10 mins compared to the minimum of 3 weeks industry standard. Amenli co-founders, Shady & Adham were founding team members of Paymob, one of the fastest growing payment companies in MENA. Shady was CCO and Adham was its Tech Lead and they worked together for more than 3 years to scale-up Paymob from scratch to 50K+ merchants, 5 countries and dozens of millions of monthly transactions.

name: Moxion Power Co.
headline: All-Electric Mobile Power
description: Moxion Power manufactures industrial-scale electric generators and provides temporary-power-as-a-service to customers in the construction, events and entertainment, data center, and electrified transportation industries.  Our battery gensets have the same dimensions, run-times, and performance capabilities as traditional trailer and skid mounted diesel generators, with the added benefits of being clean, perfectly-quiet, and offering superior load flexibility.   Moxion's logistics team remotely monitors our gensets and provides battery charging/swapping services so our customers never have to worry about running out of power. Moxion has signed LOI’s with several of the largest construction firms in California and is backed by Energy Impact Partners, Y Combinator, Liquid 2 ventures and Tamarack Global. Moxion's founding team has backgrounds in vehicle electrification, battery manufacturing, renewable energy project finance, and construction.

name: Oda
headline: Visual commerce platform for real estate
description: Oda Studio is a real estate visual commerce platform that automatically optimizes real estate photos for quality and presentation, stages photos with furniture, décor and electronics, and allows e-commerce platforms to feature their products in real estate listings. Powered by AI and CGI, Oda Studio personalizes photo enhancement and staging to match user taste, enabling consumers to choose spaces and imagine their future lives as new residents.

name: Momo Medical
headline: We help nurses in nursing homes to be 30% more effective
description:
We go to nursing homes, and we put an internet-connected bed sensor underneath all their beds. Our app gives nurses valuable insights and an overview of all their residents. We reduce fall incidents and bedsores while improving evening and night shift productivity by over 30%. 

Momo Medical solves the biggest problem affecting nursing homes, staff shortages while increasing the quality of care. 

The last months, we signed 250,000$ in contracts and are signing contracts in a matter of weeks instead of the industry average of 12+months. This year, we have grown more than 25% MoM and monitor more than 1000 residents in 20 organizations. We have 0% churn, and nurses love what we have built.

name: MergeQueue
headline: Google-level engineering productivity suite
description:
MergeQueue is a developer tool that automates merge workflows and keeps builds healthy. Engineers save up to 5 hours a week and avoid frustration of broken builds.

Our users include Slack, Bosch, Lightspeed, Fast Checkout and many others. For instance, Slack went from 180 master-build failures per quarter to just 1 build failure when they started using MergeQueue.

Our goal is to become the leading brand for developer experience.

name: Anakin
headline: We send eCommerce companies LIVE pricing data of their competitors
description:
Anakin helps e-commerce stores and brands increase their revenue by sending them the pricing, products and trends data of their competitors. Using Anakin, stores like Instacart, Walmart and Nike can increase their revenue by up to 12%. 

The number one issue facing big e-commerce companies today is maintaining and pricing millions of SKUs across geographies correctly. Anakin makes it easy and fully automated. Anakin is growing 28% every month and is live in 10+ countries with 3 multi-billion dollar eCommerce companies as clients.

name: Flowly
headline: Our mobile app reduces chronic pain for 100 million Americans.
description:
Flowly’s mobile app is the VR version of Calm with a focus on reducing chronic pain for 100 million Americans. Flowly subscribers receive a $5 VR headset and Heart Rate sensor that collects a user's biometric data like HR and HRV, and converts it to visualizations in virtual experiences that reduce pain by 46%. 
Flowly is backed by the National Institutes of Health.

name: Ruth Health
headline: Telehealth for pregnant people 🧡
description:
Ruth Health treats the 83% of post-pregnancy womxn who pee in their pants. We deliver 30-minute Postpartum Recovery + Training Sessions via telehealth, so moms around the globe with pelvic floor prolapse can get back to work, sex, and normal life—5x faster.

Using conversational AI + biometric readings, Ruth Health will accumulate the largest, most diverse database in America on longitudinal maternal health

name: Verihubs
headline: Data and Verification Platform for Indonesian Fintechs
description: Verihubs builds a digital infrastructure and provides a range of AI-based services for financial services enterprises in Indonesia, enabling them to create a seamless customer onboarding process, from phone number verification, end-to-end KYC process, fraud detection, to instantaneous bank account linking, all in a single continuous flow. In addition to getting an instant verification, the end-users can also immediately start pulling funds directly from their bank account of choice as we provide an interconnection between their financial platforms.

name: Heimdal
headline: Concrete and glass made from CO2 from the atmosphere
description: Heimdal produces calcium and magnesium carbonate extracted from the ocean to capture CO2 in a solid form which can be used in industries ranging from concrete to steel. The concrete industry alone accounts for 8% of global carbon emissions with the vast majority of this coming from the burning of limestone in kilns. This limestone is ordinarily mined and burned, releasing a natural store of CO2 into the atmosphere - it can be thought of much like burning fossil fuels. Heimdal's method instead produces synthetic limestone and dolomite from CO2 in the atmosphere and ions in the ocean to prevent new emissions.

name: Stack
headline: Vanguard of India for Effortless Investing
description: Stack helps users to save for their life goals like retirement, marriage, education through low fees and globally diversified ETF portfolios in an effortless and automated manner. Savings can be set on autopilot by setting personalised rules such as 'round up' on transactions or 'set & forget'.  Stack also helps the users to earn passive income as they spend through Stock reward on the Stack Card.

name: Le Tote
headline: Subscription service for women's apparel & accessories.
description:
Le Tote is the leading online fashion service, providing women access to an unlimited, personalized closet of everyday apparel. Its highly analytical, data-driven approach to retail aims to fundamentally transform the next generation of commerce. Leveraging more than 2B customer data points, the proprietary style and personalization engine is fully powered by algorithms, and supported by custom-built, end-to-end technology and logistics solutions.

Le Tote has customers across 48 states in the U.S. and recently launched in China. The company has seen over 300% growth year over year for the past 2 years and has raised more than $60M from top-tier venture capital firms including Andreessen Horowitz, Google Ventures, Y Combinator, Azure Capital and Sway Ventures.

name: Proxy
headline: Web3 Identity Wallet
description: Founded in 2016, we’re on a mission to create a Web3 powered digital twin and to make it universally accessible and infinitely useful.

name: Arrow
headline: One-Click Checkouts for Southeast Asia
description: Arrow is the fastest way to checkout in South-East Asia. Arrow works across all platforms, empowering anyone to collect payments, in one-click.

name: Skio
headline: Subscriptions for Shopify
description:
Skio (skio.com) helps brands on Shopify sell subscriptions without ripping their hair out.

Customers include Bev, Muddy Bites, MatchaBar, Krave Beauty, Stryx, Doe Lashes, Sunsoil, Remedy Organics, Siete Foods, Gooey Snacks, Munk Pack, OneBlade, Barukas, & Red Bay Coffee.

We've raised $3.7M from investors like Y Combinator, MuteSix’s Daniel Rutberg and Moody Nashawaty, Shaan Puri, Italic CEO Jeremy Cai, Tilt co-founder and Magic Mind founder James Beshara, Julian Shapiro and Sahil Bloom, as well as founders and executives of companies such as Immi, Thingtesting, Taika, Smile.io, Literati, Linjer, Raycon, Cresicor, Carted, Orchard Analytics, & Cohere.

We do better than current solutions with:
* 1-click checkout with Shop Pay (increase conversions by 72%, native Shopify checkout, no duplicate products, no checkout.rechargeapps.com url, no separate refunding)
* passwordless login (reduce customer tickets by 25%)
* a hosted subscription portal (get automatic features updates instead of needing constant theme development, uses React/Next.js/GraphQL)
* 6x faster subscription editing (increase CX efficiency by 20%)
* group subscription discounts (referrals 2.0, similar to family plans)
* an easy migration from ReCharge (no payment method updates needed, gradual rollout available, takes 1 day to 1 week)

name: DigiBuild Software
headline: We build construction software to improve projects, profits, & people.
description:
Our tools help large companies, like VCC Construction, improve the schedule and budget on projects and save millions annually.

Our customers manage workflows such as procurement, budgets, schedules, contracts, and payments. We provide automation, audit capabilities, and data insights that are unmatched by current incumbents in the market.

We've managed over $5B in construction projects and our tech team has built products for some of the top companies in the world so we know how to build software that improves the construction industry.

name: FloatPays
headline: On-demand wage access service built for the African market
description:
Floatpays is an on-demand wage access platform that helps employees access, spend, save and manage their money.

The problem we are solving is that more than 75% of the 12 million employed South African’s run out of money before the end of the month, 52% of those end up borrowing money to survive. Informal lending is the only option for most borrowers, with interest rates anywhere between 30-50%. The story is the same in most African countries where payday/micro-lending has become the norm amongst lower-income earners.

Our app features include financial education, a budget planning tool, cash access, and voucher purchases all from wages earned but unpaid. We are currently working on a savings product to promote long-term financial resilience.
	
We launched our product in South Africa in July 2020 and plan to extend our reach into additional African countries in 2022 and beyond.

name: Scispot
headline: Life science operating platform
description:
Scispot is a fully configurable workflow automation platform for fast-growing life science companies.  Our customers use Scispot to design and automate their workflows at all stages of their R&D, from planning, lab execution to reporting collaboratively.

Scispot creates a connected digital replica of an entire life science company -- it centralizes company-wide data, templatizes routine research, and automates non-scientific tasks. The primary issue facing any growing life science company is disconnected data. Connecting this disparate data requires a lot of custom engineering resources and developing code. But with Scispot, these companies can easily connect research, operations, and inventory data without writing a single line of code. 

Within 4 months of the official launch, Scispot has become a digital partner of a wide range of life science companies that focus on lab-grown meat, biomanufacturing, biotherapeutics R&D, mass spectrometry research, preclinical contract research, and microbiome research.

name: ProcessLabs
headline: Helping Engineering teams become the best version of themselves
description: A web platform to help SW Engineering leaders with actionable insights, automations and collaboration tools to improve efficiency, ensure best practices, and boost team motivation.

name: Stayflexi
headline: Modern Operating System for Hotels and Vacation Rentals
description:
Stayflexi helps hotels and vacation rentals automate operations and maximize revenues on unsold rooms and amenities. Today, 80% of hotel operations, like guest check-ins and room upgrades, are done manually and lead to a negative customer experience. For example, if a flight lands early, often there's no way to get early check-in. Stayflexi solves these problems with a fully-automated management and upsell platform. The company is founded by computer science majors from Carnegie Mellon and Cornell to address their own problems as hosts as well as travelers.

We are live across 900 hotels in 10 different countries.

name: SnapEDA
headline: SnapEDA is the first & leading search engine for electronics design
description: SnapEDA is a platform for electronics design. Our search engine for CAD models helps over 1 million professional engineers design hardware faster, at organizations like Google, Amazon, NASA, and many more. At the same time, we're helping component suppliers scale their revenue in a digital age with our product recommendation and attribution technology.

name: Dots
headline: Scale customer communities to drive revenue and retention
description:
Dots helps companies interact with their customers through their Slack or Discord communities to increase revenue and retention. 

Email and help forums don’t work anymore. B2B companies are interacting with their customers in chat communities. Ultimately, customers want a real time connection to their Account Exec, customer success rep and other customers.  And companies need software to scale these interactions - that is what Dots provides through automation of manual tasks (DM'ing segments), and analyzing the activity of key accounts.

name: Atmana
headline: Helping 15-30 year olds control technology addictions
description:
At Atmana, we help millennials cut down on technology addictions like gaming, pornography and social media. We charge users $90 per year for our solution consisting of blocking and techniques used in treating in alcohol and drug addiction like peer support groups, buddy program and psycho education. 

Our first product- BlockerX, helps millennials cut down on compulsive watching of pornography.

name: QuickNode
headline: Tools & infra to build and scale high-quality blockchain applications.
description: Web3 developer platform to build, test, and scale blockchain applications. Lightning fast access to Ethereum, Bitcoin, Solana, Terra, Celo, BSC, Polygon & xDai nodes: elastic APIs, powerful tools, analytics, all at your command through a simple control panel. Want to build the next great dApp? Build it on QuickNode.

name: MindFi
headline: Transforming Mental Health for Corporate Asia
description: MindFi is an app that reduces burnout and improves mental health for employees. We sell to companies in Asia such as Deutsche Bank, KPMG, PatSnap, Visa. Our annual revenue is US $150k to date and we’re growing 53% month on month. The team is headquartered in Singapore and consists of Bjorn, (ex-Zendesk product manager), psychologist Anita Sadasivan (UMich alum, ex-Raffles Hospital), Leon 2X startup founder with 2 exits and Gangeshwar, an award-winning AI engineer.

name: Writesonic
headline: AI-powered copywriting and content marketing.
description:
Writesonic is an AI-powered copywriting tool that generates unique and engaging marketing content for any business in seconds. With a few lines of text, Writesonic will generate ads, blog posts, landing pages, product descriptions, and more.

Writesonic has over 1600 reviews and a 4.8 star average on Trustpilot, G2, and Capterra, by far the highest in the category, and our user acquisition to date has been 100% organic - mostly through word of mouth and SEO.

name: Banner
headline: Banner is the Operating System for Commercial Real Estate teams
description:
Banner is the operating system for real estate teams. From building acquisition to disposition, Banner moves all communications, workflows, spreadsheets, and file-sharing into one system. With Banner, customers automate away 80%+ of their administrative work, saving up to 10% on project costs.
The company is founded by Mark Murphy who formerly worked in RE finance, along with Kunal Chaudhary and Eric Gao, both UC Berkeley EECS alums.

name: Awesomic
headline: Get design tasks done in 24h
description:
Awesomic matches companies with the vetted designers instantly. Companies pay a flat monthly subscription and get results every business day, in 24 hours. 

We’ve already worked with 600+ companies worldwide; 100+ of them are YC startups. 
We tripled our revenue since April.

Feel free to check out more about Awesomic below:

How App Works – https://www.awesomic.io/how-it-works
Portfolio – https://www.awesomic.io/portfolio
Customers' Cases – https://www.awesomic.io/case-study
Book a Live Demo – https://www.awesomic.io/demo

name: Ferveret
headline: Ferveret develops liquid cooling technology for data centers
description: Ferveret develops liquid cooling technology for data centers inspired by nuclear power plant cooling. We save data centers 96% in cooling costs, 68% on capital costs and reduce their carbon footprint by 40% while increasing chip performance by 2X. Today about 40% of the electricity use of these facilities is wasted for cooling. Ferveret patent-pending technology revolutionizes the data center cooling and eliminates the waste of electricity. Furthermore, this technology can be implemented overnight in existing data centers with our uniquely designed tanks. The company is founded by Reza Azizian, MIT alumnus, one of the lead thermal architects for Microsoft HoloLens and at NVIDIA, and Matteo Bucci, an MIT professor with 15 years of experience in two-phase heat transfer for nuclear reactors. We have in lab proof of concept of our technology, and we are in the process of building demo units to launch pilot programs with our first two industrial customers. Some of our notable investors are YCombinator and E14 fund.

name: Verano Health
headline: Nonprofit telehealth coaches for underserved Americans on Medicaid
description:
We're building the nation's largest digital diabetes platform for underserved Americans. There are 80 million Americans on Medicaid and 30% or more have chronic disease. Less than 1% of patients with diabetes receive needed training.

We provide a SMS-based telehealth platform to people with chronic disease on Medicaid. Our proven Healthy at Home program uses 2-way SMS interactions, weekly diabetes coaching visits, and evidence-based health education. 

Our vision is to reach millions of Americans that lack at-home support for chronic disease. We're billing health insurance $186 for telehealth visits and have 2 contracts underway. With your support, we can be a fully sustainable nonprofit by 2023.

name: WANTD
headline: The trusted source and one-stop shop for all things sneakers.
description: WANTD is a data aggregator and advanced analytics tool focused on the sneaker and streetwear market. WANTD provides near real-time cross platform pricing from all the major streetwear marketplaces (GOAT, StockX, eBay, Stadium Goods) combined with inventory management tools, data and analytics (e.g. sneaker price forecasts), one-click cross platform listing, and exclusive content. Our goal is to harmonize the user journey for both sneaker resellers and buyers in an otherwise disjointed market, while providing tools that create efficiencies and insight to enable smarter decisions.

name: Fly.io
headline: We run app servers close to your users.
description: We run app servers and databases close to end users. Developers deploy their apps to Fly.io (it's about the simplest place to deploy a Docker Image) and use our CLI to launch instances in regions that are most important for their application.

name: BrainKey
headline: Brain Longevity Platform
description:
The BrainKey Platform provides a:
-brain age assessment
-brain age optimization plan
-continuous brain age monitoring

name: Akido Labs
headline: Unlocking data to tackle the homelessness, chronic disease, and more
description:
Akido is a care delivery platform focused on overcoming the complex needs of our most vulnerable populations. We are on a mission to leverage modern technology and proprietary datasets that have historically been locked up in our public health ecosystems in order to radically improve the quality of life and affordability of care for underserved people.

We are a fast-growing, impact-focused, Y Combinator company being used nationwide to combat the Covid-19 pandemic, homelessness, and other public health crises. Across the country, health systems and government service providers use Akido to launch new technology-powered public health initiatives that improve the health and well-being of the communities they serve.

name: Endla
headline: Software that increases the value of oil & gas wells
description:
Endla increases the value of oil & gas wells by providing software that helps design the well that maximizes ROI.

Our product AlphaSpace, optimizes the well design by automatically producing many high-quality options which the engineer can then measure against their business objectives (auto-design). Having software that finds the optimal solution, empowers the engineer to work a layer up on understanding the problem and specifying the important objectives.

Our vision is to make auto-design and auto-operation software part of the workflow for every engineer working with physical assets.

name: TransAstra Corporation
headline: Orbital logistics: Unleashing space industry, from Earth to asteroids
description: TransAstra builds and flies space tugs that take customer satellites from where they are in orbit to where they need to go. Our tugs will mine asteroids and move heavy industry to outer space. Our proprietary Omnivore™ thruster is a breakthrough solar thermal rocket we are developing to dominate the orbital logistics market. Omnivore is less expensive and higher in performance than the best thrusters on the market today and can use nearly any fluid as propellant, greatly simplifying orbital logistics. Our founder, Dr. Joel Sercel, is a Caltech space propulsion technologist and plasma physicist, former NASA/JPL engineer, and former CTO of Momentus. We have signed MOUs with Blue Origin and several other aerospace companies and are signing new deals weekly. We have over a $100M in market traction based on LOIs, MOUs, and contracts for orbital logistics and supply. In Y Combinator S21, thus far TransAstra has accepted more than $4.5M in private investment and more than $4.5M of undiluted NASA funding.

name: Noya
headline: Capturing CO2 from the sky and re-selling it for 2x cheaper
description: Noya captures CO2 from the sky and re-sells it for 2x cheaper than existing options. We do this by retrofitting existing industrial equipment like cooling towers and converting them into CO2 capture machines.

name: SnapCalorie
headline: Single photo nutrition tracking.
description: SnapCalorie is the world’s first app where you can take a photo of ANY meal and get an accurate calorie count.  It takes seconds to use and is more accurate than a trained nutritionist. The team previously co-founded Google Lens, Cloud Vision API, and published a CVPR paper demonstrating the first algorithm to outperform a professional nutritionist at calorie counting. We started building three months ago and already trained a complex AI algorithm, built an app from scratch, and launched a beta to early adopters. With 45M Americans dieting each month, and charging $16 a month, this presents a 9 billion dollar market opportunity in the US alone.

name: Repool
headline: Making hedge funds easy to create and join. For everyone.
description: Repool is a fintech platform that makes it easy to create and join hedge funds for talented retail investors and traditional emerging managers, like Angellist for hedge funds.  We're building the future of financial services for private funds.

name: Amplitude
headline: Pioneering Digital Optimization
description: Amplitude is the global leader in Digital Optimization. More than 1,000 customers, including Ford, Peloton, Pepsico, Shopify, Athenahealth and 23 of the Fortune 100, rely on Amplitude to help them innovate faster and smarter by answering the strategic question: "How do our digital products drive our business?" The Amplitude Digital Optimization System makes critical data accessible and actionable to every team — unifying product, marketing, developers, and executive teams around a new depth of customer understanding and common visibility into what drives business outcomes. Amplitude is the #1 leader in product analytics. Learn how to optimize your digital products and business at amplitude.com.

name: Vendease
headline: Where restaurants in Africa buy food supplies
description:
Vendease is a marketplace that lets restaurants in Africa, order directly from farms and food manufacturers.

Now, instead of going through expensive - middlemen - vendors, or wasting productive man hours sending staff to open markets with hiked prices, restaurants can now get on our platform, click to order and get all their food supplies within 24hrs.

name: Endpoint Health
headline: Precision-first therapies
description: Endpoint Health is on a mission to address urgent needs in immune-driven critical and chronic illnesses by delivering therapies that are personalized to each patient’s biology. We built Endpoint Health from the ground up to develop and commercialize therapeutics and therapy-guiding tests, to ensure that every patient receives personalized treatment that will dramatically improve their outcomes. Our vision is a world in which all patients have effective, personalized treatment, because therapies are targeted to the right patient at the right time.

name: Fobo
headline: Sell to people nearby.
description:
FOBO is a local marketplace for selling consumer electronics.

FOBO offers users a new way to sell goods via mobile app. It gets rid of all the hassle that is usually associated with local marketplaces and makes it ultra-simple and ultra-fast to do so. The app guarantees sellers will get a certain price for their devices and will be paid upfront, and ensures that their product is sold fast — within 97 minutes.

name: Meru Health
headline: An online provider for greater mental health
description: Meru Health is an online provider for greater mental health with remote clinicians (licensed therapists & psychiatrists), a smartphone-based treatment program, a biofeedback wearable and an anonymous peer-support group. Meru Health is committed to evidence-based care and has published groundbreaking clinical outcomes in several peer-reviewed medical journals with Harvard & UC Davis. Meru Health has offices in San Mateo, California and Helsinki, Finland.

name: Porter
headline: Heroku in your own cloud

name: Emi Labs
headline: Helping great teams hire better frontline workers, faster.
description:
At Emi Labs (YC '19) we are on a mission to increase frontline workers' access to
professional opportunities by building the infrastructure for Frontline Workers (check our
manifesto here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/our-manifesto-building-infrastructure-frontline-workers-emi-labs/). As our first step, we are transforming the high-volume recruiting
process of Frontline Workers to make it as simple, human, and fair as possible for both
Candidates and Recruiters. Our product is a SaaS recruitment platform powered by AI
that helps companies engage with candidates via text to drive faster and more efficient
hiring processes. We are growing fast, well funded, and obsessed with making our mission
a reality.

Some of their customers include Walmart, Burger King, Starbucks, 7-Eleven, Danone, Imperfect Foods, or Heineken.

name: Adra
headline: Driving dental clinic revenue by finding more cavities
description:
Adra is a software that helps dental clinics find cavities and other problems in x-rays faster and more accurately so they can book more procedures and increase their revenue. We started our pilot with 20 dentists 2 months ago and have already increased their clinic revenue by 12%. 
Adra is founded by a dentist and clinic owner, a machine learning expert, and a bioscientist.
When every dentist uses Adra, they will bill patients an extra $52B per year. We will capture a quarter of that, making our addressable market $13B.
https://www.adra.ai/

name: Fibo
headline: SaaS calendar and messaging for SMBs with front line employees

name: Spark Studio
headline: Online extracurricular courses for kids (5-15 yrs)
description:
Spark Studio brings quality extracurricular learning for children to the convenience of their homes. Courses are taught to children between 5 and 15 years of age in classrooms sized 1:6. Courses last between 10-15 weeks.

We’re building this with a full-stack approach (as opposed to a marketplace) in three categories - communication skills, music and visual arts. We design curriculum, train teachers, develop content and interactive technology for kids to play and practice. This makes our students love these classes, resulting in a completion rate of 98.5%!

name: Spiral Genetics
headline: Large Scale Genomic Data Mining Software
description: Spiral Genetics (YC W19) makes genomic data mining software to compare large populations of whole human genomes. Our customers are genetics testing companies, governments of countries, and pharma companies. We train our machine learning algorithms to enable large scale comparison of genomes to power novel discoveries, enabling new diagnostics and drugable targets.

name: Hideout
headline: A portfolio of delivery-only restaurant brands

name: Generally Intelligent
headline: Early-stage AI research company
description:
Generally Intelligent is an AI research company. We help machines learn to understand the world the way humans do. Our mission is to build human-like general machine intelligence and make it safely accessible in order to foster a more abundant, equitable, and creative human society.

We take a first-principles approach to understanding the fundamentals of learning, starting with simple self-supervised networks solving early evolutionary problems, and increasing complexity incrementally.

name: Mason
headline: Smarter from start to finish with Mason.™
description:
WE'RE HIRING! Check out our website for all open jobs: https://bymason.com/careers/

Mason is the fastest way to take smart devices from idea to end user. Whether building a single-use device from scratch or scaling a line of smart products, with Mason it’s 20x faster and 10x less costly to build, deploy and scale. Digital transformation is a modern requirement but operating a hardware-dependent initiative is hard – thousands of hours and millions of dollars are at stake.

The Mason Smart Device Platform is the only fully managed infrastructure for developing and delivering dedicated devices. It offers flexible usage-based pricing for fleets of devices and manages the underlying complexity of all associated backend services, making software delivery on a smart product line—whether it’s a tablet, wearable or new form factor—as simple as delivering software in the cloud. This frees innovators to focus on what matters: application development, feature specification and UX. Granular access to add, remove or lock down capabilities makes it possible for highly customized products to be built as envisioned.

Mason offloads hardware investment risks and logistics, including inventory procurement, warehousing and supply chain management. With options like zero-touch provisioning, devices can work perfectly out of the box without end user intervention. Remote fleet management, troubleshooting and automated software updates by Mason ensure security and positive end user experiences. Organizations of all sizes rely on Mason to bring innovations and hundreds of use cases to market without reinventing the wheel. Smarter from start to finish with Mason.™

AWARDS
* 2022: Best Places to Work & Best Small Places to Work, Built In Seattle
* 2022: IoT Health & Wellness Innovation of the Year, IoT Breakthrough
* 2021: Deloitte Technology Fast 500™, Deloitte
* 2019: Tech Impact Awards, Mobile - Silver, Seattle Business magazine

Follow us on LinkedIn | https://www.linkedin.com/company/mason-america/

name: Anfin
headline: Modern trading and wealth management for Vietnam
description: Anfin is building a modern trading experience for the retail investors of Vietnam. Anfin is built upon key principles of user-friendly design through user research, expanded access through fractional shares, and financial literacy through modern forms of education.

name: Tenjin
headline: Mobile marketing analytics and infrastructure
description:
We're a mobile attribution and analytics provider, focused on helping app developers, marketers, and publishers find and grow their users. We track a bunch of metrics such as ad spend, ad revenue, in-app purchase revenue, subscription revenue, retention, etc. We also have a data warehousing product that lets our customers directly query the data we've collected.

Experts at mobile advertising, need help with handling all of this data and making a very technical front-end more user-friendly.

name: R2
headline: Stripe Capital-as-a-service
description: R2 enables platforms to seamlessly offer flexible financing to their merchants in Latin America

name: Theorem LP
headline: The mission of Theorem is to make credit safe and available. We use…
description: Theorem conducts independent underwriting of consumer loans originated by banks, credit cards companies and other lenders. We utilize this information to manage institutional capital and securitize loans

name: Juni
headline: A learning platform helping every student achieve their best future.
description:
Juni is a membership-driven learning platform designed to help each student discover and pursue their passions with joy. The company offers award-winning curriculums in Computer Science, Math, and English for students 7-18 taught by near-peer instructors from top universities and access to a global community. Through project-centered courses, best-in-class technology, and the power of community, Juni’s varied learning experiences prepare students for their best future.

Juni is backed by Forerunner Ventures, Index Ventures, Y Combinator Co-founder Jessica Livingston, Arielle Zuckerberg, and more. The company is headquartered in San Francisco and was recently featured in Forbes, Fortune, WSJ, Fast Company and TechCrunch.

name: FightCamp
headline: Home boxing gym with motion trackers that compute punches and reps.
description: With FightCamp you get access to world-class boxing and kickboxing trainers, studio-quality equipment, and performance-tracking technology — all from the comfort of your home. The key to a FightCamp workout lies in our Punch Tracking technology — we allow you to measure every strike, deliver real-time stats and fuel your competitive side.

name: Retool
headline: Build internal tools fast.
description: Retool is the fast way to build internal tools.

name: Daily
headline: The world's best API for real-time video: add video calls to your app…
description: Daily is the developer platform for real-time video. With just a couple lines of code, you can add 1-click video calls to any site or app — in minutes, with features across use cases, on a global infrastructure. Developers can create custom video UI/UX with our front-end libraries and REST APIs.

name: Chipax
headline: Quickbooks for SMBs in Latam
description: Chipax handles all payments, invoices, and reconciliations to provide real-time AR & AP for SMBs, starting in Mexico and Chile. We're currently at $1.6M ARR with more than 1,100 paying businesses. The company is founded by Antonio Correa, François Gueneau de Mussy, Joaquín Brenner, and Felipe Urzúa, Engineers from top universities in Chile, who have all experienced the pain of managing SMBs finances first hand in their previous jobs.

name: Pantheon
headline: A competitive community of the brightest students in the world
description: Pantheon is an online competitive community of the brightest students in the world. High school and middle school students match with each other based on skill level and compete head-to-head in real-time to see who can answer questions fastest, much like offline competitions such as Science Bowl.

name: Perfect Recall
headline: Replace long, messy notes with short, consumable meeting clips
description:
Perfect Recall records, transcribes, and lets you create clips from your customer calls simply by highlighting transcript text. 
Embed in tools like Slack, Notion, and Asana. 
Faster and more effective than written notes.

name: bxblue
headline: bxblue is a marketplace for people with guaranteed income in Brazil.…
description: bxblue is a Y Combinator backed (S17) Personal loan marketplace for pensioners and government workers with guaranteed income in Brazil. bxblue is taking this $80 billion market online.

name: Kurios
headline: Cohort-based online courses for professionals in Latin America
description:
Kurios is cohort based online courses for professionals in Latin America. Our instructors are professionals coming out of tech companies like Google, Amazon, Stripe and more. 

Our course completion rate is 90% and annual customer retention rate is 100%.

We have 65 B2B customers and we up-skill their employees in product management, growth and data analytics, just to start with.

Some customers: Walmart Mexico, Banorte (2nd bank in Mexico), Mercado Libre, BCP (#1 bank in Peru), Alicorp (leading CPG in Latam), Sura (leading pension fund), etc.

name: RevenueCat
headline: Developer tools to easily build in-app purchases and subscriptions.
description:
RevenueCat is a mobile framework and hosted web service that dramatically reduces the implementation time for mobile in-app subscriptions. 

Our backend tracks your subscribers from multiple platforms and provides a single source of truth.

name: HomeBreeze
headline: Upfront prices and easy booking for home repairs
description: HomeBreeze is a managed marketplace for home services. We’ve built the easiest, fastest, and most transparent way to get work done on your home, starting with water heater replacements and other plumbing services. We use details about your home to provide upfront, guaranteed prices and instant scheduling, with work completed by our network of qualified professionals.

name: Clever
headline: The platform that powers technology in the classroom.
description:
Clever is a single platform for all of your digital learning programs. Founded in 2012, Clever was started by educators and technology professionals who knew that schools, teachers, and students could all benefit from the amazing learning software that was available, but key challenges stood in the way of accessing the technology. Today, half of K-12 schools in the U.S. use Clever to give students and teachers single sign-on access for any resource or file they need, and to automate software account setup and updates for district administrators. Clever gives teachers time to teach, helps districts be better informed, and makes using applications in the classroom effortless.

We are a team of more than 100 people passionate about education. If you feel the same way, you should see our openings at https://clever.com/about/jobs.

name: Fingo Africa
headline: A neobank for Africa's 500 million youth
description:
Fingo is building a pan-African digital bank.

Today, most Africans pay 5-15% fees to transfer money to friends, family, or businesses - with Fingo these fees will be 90% cheaper. 

In 240 seconds, any young person will be able to access a full suite of financial services including personal, business, investment and savings accounts.

name: Eight Sleep
headline: The sleep fitness company.
description: Eight Sleep is the world's first sleep fitness brand with a mission to fuel human potential through optimal sleep. Founded in New York City in 2014, Eight Sleep leverages thermoregulation, data, and technology to design products to restore individuals to their peak energy every morning. Eight Sleep was named one of Fast Company's “Most Innovative Companies of 2018”, and recognized by TIME's Best Inventions of 2018 and 2019.

name: Quadrant Eye
headline: Enabling at-home eyecare.
description:
Quadrant Eye is on a mission to improve eyecare access and fight preventable blindness. We're building the next generation eye exam... inside the average American home. 

V1 of our eye exam allows patients to renew their glasses and contact lens prescriptions online. V_final will be an end-to-end exam that can remotely detect eye abnormalities. 

Our team wants to enable patients' best and most visually rich lives. To this end, we're looking for curious and nimble minds to help us develop the world's first at-home eye exam and ultimately deliver high-quality eyecare at scale.

Some QE highlights:

🐝 We're a team of renegades: ex-founders, surgeons, scientists, digital nomads, and polymath hackers.
💸 Our backers include Y Combinator, Khosla Ventures, and the creator of Google Image Search.
🍥 We're a mission-driven company tackling an eye health market worth $USD137B.
💵  Revenue isn't our main metric right now, but it did double last month!
🌟 Our core focus in the coming months is the development of patentable deep tech.

name: Embrace
headline: The Mobile Observability and Data Platform to Transform Your Business
description:
*S19 and YCG F21*
Embrace is a mobile data platform with an initial application in observability and user experience. The founding CEO previously built Scopely as CxO ($8B+ valuation). His frustration with the fragmentation of mobile tools and their low-fidelity data led him to build Embrace. Their solution is highly differentiated as they are able to capture 100% of user-behavioral and technical time-based session data rather than relying on sampling. Mobile teams love this and Embrace has an impressive list of customers such as Wildlife, 2K, GOAT, Hyatt, Hilton, Cameo, and MasterClass.

name: Codex
headline: Make programming multiplayer
description: Codex is a devtool and local first solution that enables just-in-time documentation for deep collaboration wherever you work. From your IDE, like VSCode, to our desktop app. When you’re working and think “what the #$@%!? does this code block do?” Codex let’s you request context with a button click. It then determines the best person to respond and stores their answer for other team members to access later, all automatically and directly on the code block.

name: Nuvocargo
headline: Your all-in-one digital platform for trade across the Americas
description:
Nuvocargo is a digital-first freight forwarder and licensed US customs broker focused on helping shippers seamlessly move cargo over the road between USA and Mexico. Our goal is to make your life easier by combining exceptional service with beautiful software so that moving your products between USA and Mexico is less painful and more intuitive.

We are the **one-stop shop** for shippers for everything they need in their USA/Mexico cross-border supply chain; this includes procuring freight in both Mexico & USA, customs clearance, insurance, trade finance, reporting, and more. We act as an extension of your team so you can outsource to Nuvocargo all the complexities & vendor management associated with your cross border supply chain.

name: Anjuna
headline: Full-stack hardware-level encryption without changing applications
description: Anjuna makes hardware-grade application and data protection simple, fast and enterprise-ready. Anjuna software enables IT to “lift and shift” applications and data into the hardware-encrypted confines of a secure enclave, protecting them from malicious software, insiders, and bad actors. Available from every major chip, cloud, and system vendor, secure enclaves are the data security gold standard. Unlike point memory-only enclave solutions that require expensive and complicated software rewrites, Anjuna enables enterprises to achieve managed enterprise-class enclave protection that span memory, storage, networks, and clouds in minutes--without recoding. Anjuna is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Weav
headline: Weav is the universal API for commerce platforms
description: Weav is building the digital infrastructure to connect small businesses with financial institutions.

name: HEO Robotics
headline: We visually monitor space objects for governments and defense
description: HEO Robotics visually monitors satellites for governments and defence. We do this by transforming existing Earth observation satellites with software to image other satellites as they fly close by.

name: Wyndly
headline: Fixing allergies from home
description: Wyndly is fixing allergies. We give you lifelong allergy relief with personalized treatment and exceptional online care. We’re making an allergy-free life easy and accessible to the 60 million Americans who suffer from environmental allergies.

name: Guilded
headline: Chat for gaming communities
description: Guilded upgrades your group chat and equips your server with integrated event calendars, forums, and more.

name: Streak
headline: Streak transforms Gmail into a customizable CRM and process…
description: Streak is the only CRM integrated entirely within your Gmail inbox, and works alongside all your other G Suite applications. It can be used to track any business process including sales, partnerships, support, hiring, deal flow, and much more. Streak also includes a powerful set of email tools including email tracking, send later, snoozing, mail merge, and more.

name: PlateJoy
headline: PlateJoy is building the technology to power disease prevention and…
description: PlateJoy uses 50 data points about how you eat and live to determine what you should be eating and provides customized meal plans and shopping lists to help you reach your goals. In 30 cities nationwide, you can send your list directly to Instacart for same day grocery delivery.

name: Rutter
headline: The Universal API for e-commerce
description:
Rutter is building a universal API for e-commerce platforms.

Similar to the financial market before Plaid, the e-commerce market is split across hundreds of platforms, such as Shopify, Squarespace, Amazon, and others.  Each of these platforms has its own app store or its equivalent, and the enterprising e-commerce developer must spend thousands of hours building integrations in order to access the entire e-commerce market.

Rutter is an integration layer letting any e-commerce tool build one integration to access any storefront or marketplace. We do this by providing an abstract schema representing products, orders, and customers.  With its support for 12 platforms and growing, Rutter cuts integration time down from 4 years to 2 weeks, helping e-commerce developers get to market faster and build world-class companies.

name: Careerist
headline: Learning platform for job seekers with job applications automation
description:
Careerist is an online learning platform that trains tech job seekers and automates their job applications with Robotic Process Automation, leading to faster and higher placement. It features live and self-paced training via adaptive-learning software and partnerships with third-party tutors who teach on Careerist's infrastructure.

Techcrunch: "Edtech meets SaaS in Careerist’s job placement learning platform. The startup trains job seekers through live and self-paced training taught by third-party tutors. The adaptive learning software is meant to help candidates prep for tech interviews. Once a candidate is well equipped, Careerist uses automation to help them apply for jobs. The startup doesn’t require tuition until candidates are placed."

name: Brevy
headline: Enable anyone to report issues and feedback directly on your website
description: The bug reporting platform for cross-functional teams. Allow anyone on the team (technical or not) give the most visually and technically robust feedback they can in the most intuitive platform we believe possible.

name: Noloco
headline: Instantly create apps around your business data. Without code.
description: Noloco is a no-code platform for teams to instantly create apps powered by their business data. Easily turn Airtable bases and spreadsheets into customer portals or internal tools without code.

name: Friz
headline: Neobank for freelancers in South-east Asia and South Asia
description: Friz is a neobank for freelancers offering a tailored debit card, credit card and invoice advance solution to project based, white collar freelancers in south east Asia and south Asia that typically do not have monthly payslips or asset ownership.

name: FunctionUp (FanPlay)
headline: Lambda School for India
description: A technical bootcamp in the Income Sharing Model. We train top tech talent with 0 upfront fee and place them across our partner companies. Also our program has a deep social impact. We  provide special assistance to women and unemployed youth in India- both economically and socially.

name: SalaryBox
headline: Gusto for India
description:
Salarybox is a payroll app for small businesses in India. There are 63 Million small businesses in India and 90% still manage payroll manually. Today, business owners manage attendance on pen-paper; calculate salary on excel and pay employees in cash.

Using our App, the entire process can be performed with the click of a button. Our app reduces the time taken to process payroll from 5 days to 5 minutes. 

We use Payroll data to build a credit profile of 300 Million+ blue-collar workers and improve access to financial products.

name: DrChrono
headline: The essential platform for modern medical practices and patients.
description:
DrChrono develops the essential platform and services for modern medical practices to make care more informed, more interactive, and more personalized. The open platform powers telehealth, electronic health record (EHR), practice management, medical billing, and revenue cycle solutions for physicians and patients, and is fully extensible via a robust API and marketplace of applications and services. The platform is used by thousands of physicians and millions of patients, and is facilitating millions of patient appointments and is processing billions of dollars in medical billing. For more information about DrChrono, visit www.drchrono.com


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


We are always asking ourselves, how can we make physician's and patient's life better through technology?

- We don’t settle.
- We are passionate.
- We are entrepreneurs.
- We strive to put a dent in the universe through healthcare.

Join us and help us make a dent in the universe through healthcare - https://drchrono.com/careers

name: CoVerified
headline: Using infection data to keep organizations safe
description: CoVerified builds integrated software that uses COVID-19 test results, vaccine records and symptom data to verify real-time compliance and help organizations re-open safely.

name: Palette
headline: Pipe for the creator economy
description: Palette gets content creators paid upfront for their brand sponsorships and platform contracts. For example, a creator with a brand sponsorship that pays $10k/month for 1 year can sell it to Palette's platform of accredited investors for a single lump sum today.

name: BuildStream
headline: The marketplace for supply chain audits and inspections
description:
We help supply chain quality teams source fully vetted inspection and audit vendors, to manage supply chain quality risks.

We have a fast growing global network of inspectors available on demand and in almost any country they're needed. Our platform is 30% cheaper, 10x faster time to hire, and we pay inspectors 15% more.

Payments, invoicing, team communication, scheduling etc is all managed in the platform to reduce the time drain and risk of error of existing manual processes.

name: Trexo Robotics
headline: Wearable robots to help people walk, starting with children with…
description: Trexo Robotics is building wearable robotic legs to help people walk, starting with childing with Cerebral Palsy. Our product allows children with disabilities like Cerebral Palsy, to walk, in many cases for the first time in their lives. Trexo was started when Manmeet found that his nephew was born with Cerebral Palsy and would never be able to walk. They are already commercial with customers all over US and Canada. Their vision is to replace the wheelchair, for children, adults, and the elderly.

name: FrontPage
headline: Public.com for India
description:
We’re building a brokerage around our community of more than 200k users sharing more than 150k ideas per month. FrontPage grew 2.5x in the last one year to 50K MAU and has >60% M1 retention.

Starting with a community to build a brokerage gives us unfair advantages over the traditional brokerages. It reduces cost of user acquisition, retains users better and builds in network effects to our brokerage.

FrontPage team is a bunch of tech and product geeks who have been active traders and investors in Indian equity markets for over 15 years combined, with a nose for building highly engaging social apps over the past half a decade. The founders are alumni from IIT Delhi, IIT Roorkee with experience in standing up consumer facing products at OLA, Flipkart, Yahoo! etc.

name: Safer Management
headline: Attendance tracking for Public Schools and Universities
description:
Safer Management sells attendance software to public school districts and colleges. Public schools receive federal funding based on their average daily attendance, and our software ensures they get the money they need.

We started Safer Mgmt. 12 months ago after I dropped off my twin boys and experienced inefficiencies with the sign-in process. We are now in 75 public schools and two colleges with annual reoccurring revenue of $621,000. We have 82% margins and are profitable. At scale, we will charge $15 per student per year. 

There are 70 million public school students in America which is a $1.4 billion dollar market opportunity.

name: ClearMix
headline: On-Demand, Fully-Remote Marketing and Sales Video Production Platform
description: Our platform connects expert producers with guests to record marketing videos remotely from anywhere - videos are produced 4x faster and at 10x lower cost.

name: Shoobs
headline: We help you find and book tickets to great entertainment events that…
description:
Shoobs offers event organisers with a convenient and powerful platform to sell tickets to their events. A couple of years ago we got thinking that selling tickets should be QUICK & EASY!
So, we decided to create Shoobs to help event organisers sell out their events efficiently!
Shoobs is the leading destination to discover and book great urban culture events in the UK,
such as Hip Hop concerts and RnB club nights.

name: Coinrule
headline: Coinrule Automates Your Crypto Investments
description:
Coinrule Catches the Next Market Opportunity on Your Behalf by Automating Your Investments.

Coinrule's previous Crowdfunding Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nnYJ4PnSvnU

name: Ophelia
headline: Medication & support to beat opioid addiction from home
description:
Ophelia helps people quit opioids without going to rehab. We offer online doctor’s visits, withdrawal medication prescriptions, and support for long-term recovery, using a protocol 6x more effective than most rehabs (2/3rds of which don't have doctors).

More than 3 million Americans are addicted to opioids, but 80% are not getting help, due to jobs, families, and privacy concerns. Meanwhile, there's a proven treatment that increases survival rates by 600%, and it's low cost, discreet, and convenient. It's called MAT, and it looks like treatment for anxiety or depression: medication plus therapy. However, doctors need a special waiver to prescribe the medication, which fewer than 5% of them have, so it's difficult to get, and most people are buying it on the street. Sadly, drug dealers aren't doctors: every 11 minutes another American dies of an opioid overdose, now the #1 cause of death for Americans under 50.

Ophelia is replacing rehab with telemedicine, using proven science and a consumer-first approach. The opioid treatment market in the U.S. is $15B, and 85% of opioid addicts have insurance that pays for it. We're treating roughly 400 patients with thousands more waiting.

Zack started Ophelia after losing his girlfriend to an opioid overdose, who found it easier to get medication from a drug dealer than a doctor. We are raising money to help patients in waiting, grow our footprint, save lives, and earn venture-level returns for investors.

name: Suggestr
headline: 10x better product recommendations for Shopify brands
description: Suggestr is a self-serve, no-code product recommendation solution for the 20M+ e-commerce brands that sell on platforms like Shopify. Marketplaces like Amazon drive up to 30% of their sales from product recommendations. They have large data science teams that build in-house recommendation engines. However, SME and mid-market brands can't afford to do this, and they don't have enough customer data to make the conventional recommendation approaches work. Suggestr uses innovative multi-modal AI technology that sees and understands products (needs 100x less data), allowing it to work with brands of all sizes (micro SME, SME, mid-market, enterprise). The solution takes less than 5 minutes to integrate and helps merchants increase online store revenues by up to 10% with AI-driven upsells and cross-sells.

name: Pylon
headline: Infrastructure management software for water & electricity companies
description:
Pylon provides water and electricity distribution companies, in emerging markets, with a platform for reducing their losses as well as opening new revenue streams. These losses are coming from leakages, consumption thefts, and uncollected bills, amongst others.
We have signed 11 utilities onto our platform across 2 countries and connected our systems to over 560k endpoints.
Today our average client has reduced their aggregate revenue losses by 45%
Expanding in Africa, LATAM, and SEA.

name: Baraka
headline: Commission-Free Investment App for the Middle East.
description:
💸Hey YC, we’re baraka (S21), a commission-free investment app for the Middle East.

🚀 Our mission

Our aim is to build a better investment experience through a content first approach that focuses on providing news and educational insight for a new generation of investors. 

📱 Our product

This is how we do it:
