•	5,000+ stocks and ETFs – the freedom to choose the companies and industries that you want to back
•	The power of financial literacy – educational  content, digestible market news and in-depth stock analysis
•	Fractional Shares – the ability to invest with as little as $1
•	Fair pricing – no commission, custody fees or inactivity fees
•	Easy to use – intuitive user journey and interface  


🕒 What's Next?

The app is available for Arabian Gulf  residents and soon to expand Middle East wide. Everyone else, please sign up to our daily, finance themed newsletter, a mashup of Robinhood Snacks and Morning Brew but for MENA. Check it out on our website: getbaraka.com.

Please reach out to give us feedback, discuss product, go-to-market strategy or anything else on founders@getbaraka.com.  

Feras & Kunal

name: Povio
headline: A design and software development company. Used by 50+ YC companies.
description:
Povio is helping founders build their digital products.

With over 1000 successfully delivered projects, we have worked together with multinationals like Volkswagen, unicorns like Flexport and notable personalities like Serena Williams.

Povio has an in-house team of over 200 developers, designers and project managers. Additionally the company is backed by a network of 300+ on-demand freelancers that have gone through our hiring process and can help scale the projects. We work on the entire product journey, from research and product design to development, maintenance and engineering team scaling.

With a rigorous hiring process, we assure the highest quality possible and strive to create long term relationships by partnering with our clients.

name: LifeAt
headline: A virtual getaway while you work 🏞
description: LifeAt is a personalizable virtual workspace that blends calm videos and everyday work apps in one place. Instead of being stuck in the same office every day, set the backdrop to be a NYC cafe or a Hawaii beach and use tools that keep you engaged.

name: Expo
headline: Expo brings together the best of the web and native apps to let you…
description: We believe that mobile apps provide a better experience than websites, but making apps is much more difficult than it needs to be. With Expo, we're bringing together the best of the web, like its development speed, fast iteration cycles, easy deploys, and automatic cross-platform support, and the performance, device capabilities, and user experience of native apps.

name: Method Financial
headline: Embedded debt repayment for developers
description: Method makes it easy for developers to embed debt repayment on their apps. We do this by offering a simple API that allows developers to initiate payments to any type of consumer debt such as student loans, credit cards or mortgages.

name: Piggy
headline: App for Indians to make investments in mutual funds, manage their…
description:
Experience an easy way to make Investments in Mutual funds in India.

Easiest platform to make mutual fund investments in India.
Because you need to make Investments, be it just to park your cash short term to earn better returns, or to invest for your goals or retirement, we've made an easy to use platform for you where you can invest in any fund in India in few clicks and have track your existing investments.

Furthermore , you make investments without paying any middlemen commissions and make more returns . After all, It is your money. Don't pay too much to others when you can do it on your own.

We're on both Android and iOS . download the app to get started 
https://piggy.co.in

name: Wasp
headline: Configuration language for building enterprise web apps 10x faster
description:
Wasp is a simple configuration language for building enterprise web apps with less code and best practices. If a developer wants to build an app like Instacart, they need to know a dozen different technologies and how to make them work together - Wasp solves this problem while still letting developers use React, Node.js and their other favourite tools.

We will enable enterprises to build modern apps quickly at scale, like Databricks did for data management.

name: JoinSub
headline: India's first aggregator and provider of local business subscriptions
description:
We, at JoinSub, are empowering the Indian small and medium retailers to drive repeat purchases & maximize their revenue by building a subscription-based model. 

India has over 14 million retail outlets, and we are poised to revolutionize the Retail Sector and enhance the buying experience both for retailers and consumers. We are dedicated to co-creating a community of futuristic retailers who are ready to embrace tech for growth.

Our Subscription Programs work wonderfully for everyone who is looking to drive repurchases, right from those in the F&B industry, to Salons, Nail Salons, Spas, Gyms, Yoga & Dance Studios, Coffee Shops, Bakeries, Dry Cleaners, Florists, etc. We can help you delight your consumers and accelerate your business, the JoinSub Way!

name: Atmos
headline: The entire homebuilding process, all online

name: Brave Care
headline: Modern healthcare for kids. Pediatric Primary, Urgent & Remote Care.
description: Brave Care is a group of kid-only primary & urgent care clinics that create a comfortable environment for little ones and reduce the stress and cost of emergency medicine for parents.  We are 1/10th the cost of an ER trip and most often a visit can be completed in 1/4th the time.  Common treatments: Pinkeye / Allergies / Tummy Bugs / Stitches / Broken Bones / Head Bumps / Sore Throats / Coughs / Fevers. Our digital services leverage our in-clinic medical professionals  to reach across the country.

name: Finary.com
headline: The new wealth manager for Europe
description: Finary is the new digital wealth manager for Europe. We allow the mass affluent to track, invest & manage their wealth.

name: DeepSource
headline: DeepSource is a fast and reliable static analysis platform
description: DeepSource continuously analyzes source code changes to find and fix issues categorized as security, performance, anti-patterns and bug-risks. DeepSource integrates with GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket and runs analysis on every commit and pull request, discovers and fixes potential issues before they make it to production.

name: Text Blaze
headline: Create dynamic text snippets and insert them anywhere on the web
description: Text Blaze saves time and increases comms quality by automating repeated typing tasks. Users save text snippets and insert them anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. Snippets can include dynamic dates, formulas, real-time input and integrations with other apps.

name: Rebank
headline: The single source of truth for startup finances

name: Podium
headline: An interaction and payments platform for local businesses.
description:
Podium is a suite of messaging tools for local business. Using our platform, businesses of all sizes can connect with customers via text to do things like request payments, collect reviews, and sell products, in a modern, convenient way. Our work streamlining this process for local businesses has awarded us recognition on top industry lists, such as Forbes’ Next Billion Dollar Startups, Forbes’ Cloud 100, the Inc. 5000 (#13), and Fast Company’s World’s Most Innovative Companies — in the last year alone.

Headquartered in Lehi, Utah, and founded in 2014, Podium is currently backed by Accel, Summit Partners, GV (formerly Google Ventures), and Y Combinator.

name: Gainful
headline: Personalized protein powder, delivered directly to your doorstep.

name: RocketLit
headline: RocketLit is an adaptive learning and assessment platform.
description:
RocketLit give all students better access to learning and educators access to the data they need to be most impactful.

Our first product, RocketLit, is an adaptive and personalized learning platform that serves reading to students at their independent level. Students read the same content at different levels of complexity and fluidly move up reading levels as they improve.

InnerOrbit is our new Science Assessment platform, giving students, teachers and administrators the practice and data they need to be successful on science tests. We serve the highest quality content and feature the most detailed reporting on the market. 

We’re a small and focused team working to change the world through science education. Our company has served over 650k students and we’re on track to more than double that number in the next year. We’re looking for folks who’ll grow into a leadership role within the organization.

name: Better Opinions
headline: Stock Market Exchange of Opinions
description: Better Opinions allow users to trade their opinion on an outcome of event. For example, If you think that India will cross 5Cr covid cases then predict yes and you will be rewarded if correct.

name: Demodesk
headline: Intelligent online meeting tool for inside sales & customer success
description: Demodesk is an intelligent online meeting platform with real-time sales enablement. We provide an interactive screen to easily demo/walk through products - no downloads/extensions  required. Because we are using virtual displays instead of sharing a local desktop screen, we can directly integrate sales assistance into the meeting flow and coach reps on the fly: Showing layovers on the sales rep’s side to guide him along the call, automatically load the right presentation content at the right time and provide real-time feedback on customer rapport.

name: Lion Pose
headline: Clean and clinical skincare for people of color
description: Lion Pose is the only clean and clinically-backed skincare brand targeting people of color (Black, Hispanic, Indian, Asian skin). Our two hero products include a hyperpigmentation serum and zinc-based mineral sunscreen that treat and protect against acne scars and discoloration. Hyperpigmentation affects over 50% of people of color.

name: Backpack
headline: Marketplace to get stuff from overseas
description:
Shopping? Buy overseas. 
Traveling? Earn some extra cash.
Let backpack help you save that high shipping cost or earn a little extra.

Backpack is a peer-to-peer platform that connects travelers and shoppers to give people access to products across markets in all continents. 
Each backpacker, regardless of their role as a carrier or a shopper, follows a simple four-step process to either earn or save money from their backpacking experience.
Travelers share their travel information and specify what kind of items they want to carry. Then they wait to get a "backpack request" and ask their price. Finally, they confirm the deal, buy the items, deliver them and earn money. Shoppers on the other hand, search items from their favorite websites and fill out the item description. Then they give their location and find a traveler coming to their city. Finally they "request backpack" and confirm the deal. Within days they can get the product and save money.  

backpack is founded with a vision to provide every citizen of the world with a choice; the choice of buying organic, authentic, and cost effective products with minimum friction.
Whether the product is state-of-the-art consumer electronics, exotic pashmina from the south-east, or even medication that are rare in some parts of the world and not so rare in others - we promise ourselves to get those products to your doorsteps. We would like to reject the counterfeits, we would like to reject the almost-originals, most importantly, we would like to not pay the heavy expense incurred, most of which we deem to be superfluous. Help us make a better, more original globalized world.

name: HitPay
headline: No code payment processing for SMBs in South East Asia
description:
HitPay is a no-code, full-stack payments and commerce platform for SMBs in South East Asia. We empower SMBs and individuals who have limited coding skills or resources, to start accepting online and in-person payments within 5 minutes on any sales channel.

HitPay merchants get access to a wide range of card, bank transfer, e-wallet, and BNPL payment methods embedded seamlessly into no-code commerce tools.

name: Siglo
headline: Home Internet for urban Latin America
description: Siglo is a wireless ISP for communities in urban Latin America offering a faster, better, and easy-to-pay service.

name: Raptor Maps
headline: Raptor Maps builds software to manage the solar PV lifecycle.
description:
Solar power is the #1 source of new energy in the world. Raptor Maps is a fast-growing, MIT-born startup that builds software to manage the solar lifecycle. We are deployed across 38 countries and 100+ million solar panels. Our software enables the solar industry to scale. 

We headquartered at Greentown Labs, the largest cleantech incubator in the US and fully and have transitioned to supporting fully remote employees.

We are looking for software engineers, customer support, salespeople, data analysts, and makers to join our small, fast-paced team.

name: Axis
headline: Macro and sector country information for companies
description: Axis is a platform for enterprise companies to get insights on the industries and countries they operate in. By using Axis, companies can easily map their regulatory ecosystem in all the countries they operate in from a single platform. We cover Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Egypt, Pakistan, and Turkey so far and are expanding to key markets in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. We are currently focused on super-serving government affairs and public policy teams within technology and consumer companies.

name: Axle Health
headline: In-home Healthcare as a Service
description: Axle Health enables telehealth companies, hospitals, insurance companies, and researchers to send nurses to their patients’ homes to administer physical services like blood draws and injections. Instead of going into a lab or doctor’s office, patients can now receive basic services at home.

name: CoinTracker
headline: Cryptocurrency Portfolio & Tax Manager
description: CoinTracker (https://www.cointracker.io) is a portfolio assistant for cryptocurrency. Used by over 500,000 cryptocurrency holders with over $20 Billion in crypto assets on exchanges, it enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. Beyond cryptocurrency, we are building a general automated financial assistant for all financial assets.

name: NALA
headline: Bank for Africans globally, starting with sending money home.
description: Hear our story here: https://youtu.be/xyQoRDqFFoc

name: Glocally
headline: Urban logistics designed for sustainable and convenient delivery.
description: We are building an urban delivery fleet of cargo bikes, which helps omnichannel retailers to ship their orders 20x faster, 100% sustainable, and with a superior user experience to traditional delivery services. By focussing on dense urban areas and partnering up with omnichannel retailers, we enable them to act like Q-Commerce players without worrying about rider operations and the delivery experience of their shoppers. Glocally offers a delivery-as-a-service model and integrates it into existing e-commerce stores.

name: Landed
headline: Tools to build financial security for people with essential jobs
description:
Landed is on a mission to help essential professionals, starting with educators,
build financial security near the communities they serve. The company
supports them on the path to homeownership by providing a personalized
team that includes a Landed homebuying expert and a partner agent. Landed
helps families navigate all of their options for buying a home, including its own
shared equity down payment program. The company provides free homebuying
education and guidance as well as competitive offer reviews. Landed currently works
with K-12, college, and university employees in expensive metro areas like San
Francisco, Seattle, Portland, Denver, Los Angeles, San Diego, D.C., Boston and Hawaiʻi.

name: Gravitl
headline: Automated WireGuard networks for cross-cloud computing and Kubernetes
description: Gravitl builds and maintains Netmaker, a virtual networking platform based on WireGuard. With Netmaker, you can bridge, clouds, the edge, and on-prem environments with scalable virtual networks that are faster than anything else. Think of it like your VPC for cross-cloud computing. Netmaker is built with Kubernetes in mind. It acts as a flexible underlay, an outbound NAT, or a multi-cluster connector.

name: Razorpay
headline: A full stack payments and neobanking platform for businesses in India.
description:
Razorpay was founded by Shashank Kumar and Harshil Mathur in 2015. Razorpay is building a new age digital banking platform (neobank) for businesses in India. Our mission is to enable frictionless banking and payments experiences for businesses of all shapes and sizes.
We started out as a B2B payments company and today, we process billions of dollars of payments for hundreds of thousands of businesses across India. We are the leading payments provider in the country and have been the first to bring most major innovations to market in the past 5 years.
With the launch of RazorpayX, we aim to become a leading provider of banking and payout products to businesses covering the gamut of current account, payroll, vendor payouts and many others. In the past year, the company has disbursed loans worth millions of dollars to thousands of businesses. 
Over time the company has developed a stellar track record of serving customer needs from freelancers and small businesses to large scale enterprises.

The company has raised USD $200M+ in funding till date from marquee investors like Sequoia Capital, Tiger Global, GIC, Ribbit Capital, Matrix Partners and many stellar angels.

name: Observe.AI
headline: Contact center AI platform.
description:
Observe.AI, a leader in Contact Center AI, transforms customer experiences and improves agent performance by helping top brands analyze 100% of calls and streamline quality assurance workflows. With Observe.AI, businesses transcribe every call with high accuracy and coach agents while gaining full visibility into their customer service operations. Observe.AI brings the power of agent assistance, automatic speech recognition, and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to modern contact centers and their frontline teams.
Observe.AI is trusted by more than 150 customers and partners, including Root Insurance, Alcon Laboratories, Tripadvisor, and Pearson. Backed by Menlo Ventures, Next47, NGP Capital, Scale Ventures, Nexus Ventures, Emergent Ventures, Steadview Capital, 01 Ventures and Y-Combinator, Observe.AI’s headquarters is in San Francisco with an office in Bangalore, India. For more information, visit www.observe.ai.

name: BillionToOne
headline: The genetic testing platform detecting and measuring disease.
description: BillionToOne has developed a DNA molecular counter that increases the cell-free DNA diagnostics resolution by over 1,000 fold. We are the only technology platform that can detect single-gene disorders in an unborn baby from maternal blood and that can accurately quantify copy number variation (CNV) changes in cancer patients. Our first product, UNITY, is the only NIPT that accurately detects single gene disorders such as cystic fibrosis and sickle cell in the baby from a blood test of the mother. UNITY covers all inherited disorders that every pregnancy needs to be tested for and has 98.5%+ sensitivity and 99%+ specificity.

name: VergeSense
headline: [We're hiring!] AI-Powered Building Management. Locations: San…
description: VergeSense is a Y Combinator-backed startup that develops an AI-powered sensing device for facility management. The sensor-as-a-system platform consists of sensing devices containing a series of different sensor hardware, including an image sensor, coupled with a cloud platform for pre-training machine learning models that run on the hardware, process data and report occupancy analysis back to VergeSense’s cloud.

name: AssemblyAI
headline: #1 Speech-to-Text API for Developers
description:
AssemblyAI is the #1 rated API for Speech Recognition. Thousands of developers use our APIs to transcribe millions of videos, podcasts, phone calls, and zoom meetings every day - powering innovative products like visual voicemail, meeting summarizers, and closed captioning.

We're backed by leading investors including Y Combinator, John and Patrick Collison of Stripe, Daniel Gross, and Nat Friedman. We were founded in 2017.

name: SuperTokens
headline: Open source alternative to Auth0 / AWS Cognito / Firebase Auth
description:
SuperTokens is building open source authentication (as an alternative to Auth0, Firebase and AWS Cognito). Add secure, hassle free authentication to your app in 1 day. We enable startups to launch quicker and focus on their core product offering

1. We're easier to implement as we take a modular approach - making it possible to pick only the features you need for your use case. This means you need not worry about complications associated with other features (eg: SSO and OAuth if you don’t need it) and this in turn makes it easier to implement and manage SuperTokens.
2. Developer's can own and manage their user's data. 
3. SuperTokens can be run on your premise for free and also has a generous hosted tier for those who dont want to manage it themselves.

SuperTokens is being used by hundreds of developers across the globe.

name: Drifting in Space
headline: Server infrastructure to supercharge browser-based tools.
description:
We are a platform for high-performance browser-based applications. We make it easier for developers to deploy apps that give every user a dedicated backend.

This is a system design that apps like Figma and GitHub codespaces use, but it's currently difficult for others to replicate it. We make it as easy as deploying a traditional web server.

name: Pronto
headline: Ride-sharing for second-tier cities in Latin America.
description:
PRONTO is the first RIDE-SHARING + DELIVERY platform for SECOND-TIER cities in LATAM. 

In second-tier cities all transactions are paid with cash, this is why the Uber model doesn´t work (since they have to collect their revenue from commissions). We solved this by creating a subscription model where drivers pay a monthly recurring subscription of 59 to 99 USD depending on their monthly revenue. This also generates a higher LTV with low CAC as well as high engagement and fidelity ratios.

Traction: Since our launch, we have achieved over 2,000,000 processed trips with more than 200,000 users, we bootstrapped until we achieved half a million trips and entered YC.

Market Size: There are over 14,000 second-tier cities in LATAM, with more than 500 million people without any access to ride-sharing or technology platforms at all.

name: Depict.ai
headline: Amazon-quality product recommendations for any e-commerce store
description:
Amazon-quality product recommendations for any e-commerce store. 

Amazon has the best product recommendations. They use their historic sales data to create these recommendations. The problem though is that other e-commerce stores lack enough sales training data to do the same.

We've solved this problem. The Depict.ai algorithm increases overall e-commerce revenue by 4-6% for any store without needing any sales data at all.

name: Momentus
headline: The space infrastructure services company
description: Momentus is a space infrastructure services company. As a first mover, Momentus will offer the most basic, foundational services that enable businesses to flourish in space. With their experienced team of aerospace, propulsion, and robotics engineers, Momentus makes and operates cost-effective and energy-efficient in-space transport and service vehicles that utilize water plasma propulsion technology. Momentus has service agreements in place with numerous private satellite companies, government agencies, and research organizations.

name: Allure Systems
headline: A.I. to create stunning fashion images for eCommerce.
description:
AllureSystems uses A.I. to create stunning apparel images for eCommerce. Allure works with leading fashion retailers to improve conversion rates by creating images that resonate with their clients in a scalable and cost effective way. 
Basically, with a single photo of a clothing,  a brand can produce unlimited images, on any model, instantly.  The ability to show  styles on models in every size increases conversion rates and wow the customers. Without needing models on-site, brands can produce images for their product page at scale.

name: Lowkey
headline: Capture, create, & share gaming moments (Acquired by Niantic!)
description: Lowkey was acquired on 11/30/2021 :)

name: A Thinking Ape
headline: We build communities through massively multiplayer mobile games
description:
Proudly recognized as one of CANADA'S TOP SMALL & MEDIUM EMPLOYERS for 2018!

Mission: We build communities.

Surrounded by mountains and water in beautiful Vancouver, BC, we are smart people who like smart people. We create mobile games with a social core that engage players and provoke us with creative new problems. We value data, informal leadership and keeping it all balanced.

When we set out to make games with massive online communities, we knew that we first had to create the ideal environment for building ambitious things: a place where brilliant and inspiring people come together to build games that make millions of players happy. We realized that we needed to find incredibly talented people and get out of their way. Since then we've paid careful attention to how we like to work together - these are some of our guiding principles: Ownership; Have Wonderful Arguments; The Best Ideas Win; Keep Growing.

We are artists, designers, and engineers. We leverage our talent with small, independent teams. And we know that a happy builder is an efficient builder.

name: Nomad Rides
headline: Nomad is the first commission free rideshare service. Instead of a…
description:
Nomad Rides is a commission-free rideshare service. With Nomad, drivers can run their own rideshare business by hooking into a network of paying customers and affordable commercial insurance for a simple monthly subscription. By removing Uber/Lyft’s 25% commission plus booking fee, Nomad drivers earn ~20% more, while riders pay ~20% less. Instead, Nomad monetizes through monthly driver subscriptions. One investor described us as the Salesforce of the Gig Economy where we sell software as a service (SaaS) to each driver. It’s the driver’s business, Nomad just sells them the software.

In our first 68 days of operation, Nomad has grown explosively. We have received over 9,450 ride requests from our 3,700+ users. We had over 1,000 ride requests in a single day as riders have grown obsessed with our service. Some of our top riders have requested 100+ rides since they have downloaded the app. We have coded the entire driver and rider apps ourselves and have reached the point where demand is far outstripping supply. We have thousands of paying, die-hard customers who tell us they love Nomad over Uber and Lyft. They say they feel safer and love our price point.

Our service is currently focused on serving large college towns and Midwestern cities.

name: Phykos
headline: Growing seaweed to stabilize the climate.

name: Pomello
headline: Analytics software that helps companies measure organizational…
description:
Pomello maps your organizational culture on a team-by-team basis, and integrates with your existing recruiting process to allow you to find the candidates most likely to thrive within your organization. 

Founded at Stanford University, Pomello’s technology is based on 30 years of research in Organizational Behavior, which has been validated over time across multiple industries.

name: Mozart Data
headline: The easiest way to set up a modern data stack
description: Mozart Data provides an out-of-the-box modern data stack that empowers anyone to easily consolidate, organize, and prepare their data for analysis. Spin up a data stack that’s built on a best-in-class data warehouse and ETL tool in hours, without any engineering. You can finally spend more time on generating insights and less time wrangling your data.

name: Roofr
headline: Sales software for roofers. Aerial measurements + proposals in seconds
description:
We're the all-in-one sales toolbox for roofers with helpful features to grow your business including:

Stunning Proposals: Create a professionally designed proposal from a measurement report. Email & capture your clients’ e-signatures from any device.

Aerial Measurement Reports: Order an accurate $10 roof measurement report or draw it yourself in minutes with drone, satellite or blueprint imagery.

Our mission is to ensure every family has access to an affordable roof.

name: arketa
headline: Everything for your fitness or wellness business.
description: All in one platform for online and in-person classes, video on-demand, courses and website hosting.

name: DailyBot
headline: In-chat automation for work
description:
DailyBot is an automation platform and chat assistant for work. It takes chat to a new level by providing automation and chat use-cases that are underserved by the current messaging platforms. It helps users get more things done within the chat to be more efficient and save time.

The new generation lives in chat. Remote/hybrid teams use DailyBot to automate daily workflows like stand-ups, team check-ins, give kudos to teammates or even to create their own chat-automation for their back-office with no-code/low-code in an environment similar to Amazon Alexa. DailyBot offers numerous add-ons to make the work experience better.

DailyBot is cross platform and already available for Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Chat and Discord.

Keywords: chatops chat-ops async nocode assistant workflow automation developer

name: SigmaOS
headline: The first web browser made for work!
description:
SigmaOS is a new type of browser designed for founders, researchers, and content creators to make you better and faster at working on the web.

You work 7+ hours a day on the web. Buried in a sea of 100+ tabs and 10+ web-apps 🤯, you constantly lose context for why you did what you did, and are always one click away from being distracted.

We took apart the browser for you, and rebuilt a new experience from the ground-up, for the FASTEST and most PRODUCTIVE work. ⚡

name: PreFlight
headline: No-code Web Apps testing for everyone
description:
PreFlight is a No-code web testing tool for anyone. Preflight is 20x faster than writing Selenium and Cypress tests. Maintaining Selenium/Cypress tests is also a big challenge. Preflight solves this problem by understanding how users understand any page and adapt to the changes and update the selectors if the test passes.

It's also super easy to set up end-to-end tests that depend on each other with Preflight's Workflow feature. You can orchestrate which test should run after another.

Creating API tests has never been so easy. Preflight prepopulates API tests from UI tests' network calls. So, you can set up API tests in minutes.

name: delt.ai
headline: Digital banking for businesses in Latam.
description: delt.ai is building a specialized digital financial service for businesses in Latam, set to tackle the +450B Market of business payments in Mexico. delt.ai is a natively digital alternative to a bank, born with payments gateways and API integrations. Its truly digital KYC-compliant onboarding allowed us to be the first opening first branchless accounts in the country. We target poorly served Startups and SMEs therefore focusing on the ~40B market opportunity that are profitable when served fully online.

name: StudyStream
headline: 24/7 video platform & online community for students to study together
description:
StudyStream is a video platform & online community that allows students to study with others from around the world 24/7 and in real time. It brings accountability & motivation to the students from over 180 countries who study with us daily.  

We have helped over 3 million students be more productive & motivated, while also feeling less isolated. Our mission is to create a global community of students who can motivate each other to succeed.

name: Uiflow
headline: No-code platform for enterprise software companies
description: At Uiflow we are building a platform that allows for developers and designers to build production applications at the speed of thought. You can imagine it as a cross between Unity and Figma

name: Vena Vitals
headline: A small sticker that monitors blood pressure continuously
description: Vena Vitals makes a small sticker that monitors blood pressure continuously. We've shown that it works in the operating room and is as accurate as the best tools doctors have today, at a fraction of the cost. We're a team of health tech scientists with multiple past startups and exits, and we've built products that have scaled to over 2M users.

name: Dharma Labs
headline: The easiest way to buy 74k+ crypto tokens with USD
description: Dharma is the only Ethereum wallet capable of seamlessly moving money between any US bank account and decentralized exchanges like Uniswap. The net result is a product that looks & feels like Coinbase on steroids — Download an App. Plug in your bank. Invest in the exponentially growing universe of tokens & yield opportunities in DeFi with a tap.

name: Unsaddl
headline: Student loan contributions as an employee benefit
description: Unsaddl is a platform that helps employers offer automated student loan contributions as an employee benefit. Student loan contributions are now tax-deductible and are a tool for recruiting and retaining talent.

name: Blixo
headline: We help companies get paid faster by automating accounts receivables
description: Blixo is a software service that helps small and medium-size businesses get paid faster by automating time intensive manual accounting practices like billing, payments, collections, and reconciliation. We do things like update expired payment methods, retry declined charges, send friendly reminders to pay, etc.

name: Slash
headline: Banking the resale economy
description: Slash is building the financial OS for a new kind of merchant: the professional reseller. We give people that trade alternative assets like exclusive sneakers and gaming consoles a line of credit, virtual cards with smart spend controls, and other software that improves the efficiency of their businesses.

name: Ascen
headline: The easiest way to hire & manage external talent
description: Ascen is the easiest way to hire & manage external talent. Ascen provides employer of record/agent of record services for fast-growing companies, staffing and recruitment firms, and labor marketplaces.

name: Maroo
headline: Buy Now Pay Later for $95B US wedding market
description:
Average wedding cost in the US is ~$40-45K. Based on NerdWallet's research in 2019 approximately 74% of couples go into debt in order to pay off their wedding expenses. They pay from 10%-35% APR on credit cards or personal loans charges and overdrafts. 

We believe there is a better way to start your married life than getting into another pile of credit debt. Which is why we are offering 0% APR payment plans up to 24 months on all wedding expenses with embedded event cancellation insurance.

name: Warmly,
headline: See helpful context and info on prospects you're meeting with on Zoom
description: Zoom fatigue sucks. Warmly helps Zoom users create deeper relationships with the people who matter most. In real time, Warmly offers instant insights and context on everyone you meet. Never prep for a meeting again when Warmly helps you learn what and who you have in common with customers, prospects and teammates. Simply connect your calendar and build rapport instantly.

name: Resquared
headline: Marketing automation platform for selling to local businesses.
description:
Local businesses were the hardest B2B segment to reach, but account for over 60% firms in the U.S.
Our SaaS application has data on every local business that are easy to get in touch with using our specialized marketing automation tools and workflows. 
Resquared has been proven to save sales pro's over 3 hours per day and result in 53% stronger leads (case study on website).

name: Runway
headline: Easier and more reliable mobile app releases for teams.

name: Synth
headline: Second brain for knowledge workers
description:
We are building a second brain for knowledge workers. Our app captures all the relevant information you consume - text, audio, video and summarizes it 1-click. It also makes it easy to search and retrieve the information you want, wherever you like.

All co-founders know each other since 2019 and met at a one-year AI fellowship. Since their time at the fellowship, they have felt frustrated creating their second brain while shifting between apps like Roam Research, and Obsidian. These applications were burdening them to do all three tasks of capturing, organizing, and retrieving, making the cost to value ratio of setting up the second brain really high. They decided to solve this and want to shift the burden of these steps on to software, making it easier for a user to build their second brain. 

Synth is targeting 30 million knowledge workers, who earn more than $100k, paying us $20 per month, presenting a $7.2billion market opportunity.

name: Clip Health
headline: Rapid, accurate, at-home diagnostics for infectious diseases
description: Clip Health has developed a smartphone-based platform for rapid, cheap, and accurate pathogen, protein, hormone, and small molecule detection or quantitation in home-use self-testing, point-of-care, and global health applications; our vision is to couple at-home diagnostics with telehealth tools that decisively "close the loop".

name: VINEBOX
headline: Wine by the glass, delivered
description:
VINEBOX is a premium wine-by-the-glass subscription service. Each month, our subscribers receive 3 single-serving portions of wine to taste, share, and enjoy. Only order more of the wine you know you love!

This is not your standard vino. 
Each VINEBOX contains 3 tubes of exceptional wine curated by our team of specialists from around the world.

We simplify wine. 
With our easy to follow tasting notes, you'll never be stumped by a wine list. Learn your favorite varietals and regions through tasting experience. We include only the info you want, nothing you don’t.

Never forget a wine again. 
With access to your VINEBOX history, you see every wine you’ve ever tasted, with notes, ratings, & reviews!

Something for everyone. 
Whether you’re a wine connoisseur or novice, VINEBOX will introduce you to new wines, new vineyards, and a new way to enjoy wine. VINEBOX also makes the perfect gift for birthdays, corporate gifting, celebrations, dinner parties, and random Tuesdays.

name: Kiter
headline: Kiter is the best way to manage opportunities for your next job
description: Kiter allows you to quickly track job applications . Keep track of information on the companies that you are applying to and make the application process fun, fast and effective.

name: Meru.com
headline: The leading B2B wholesale marketplace in Latin America.
description:
Our goal is to enable the 27M SMBs and shop owners in the region to thrive. Meru provides local businesses with quality inventory from a wide array of categories, great wholesale prices, at-shop deliveries, convenient returns, 24h/7 customer service and easy financing. Through the Meru platform we help local and foreign manufacturers get direct access to a large base of customers that would otherwise be unreachable. 

We connect all players in the supply chain through proprietary technology by leveraging the scalability of e-commerce. We are building the underlying infrastructure of global modern commerce; we envision a future where access to inventory is fully democratized across millions of SMBs. We believe B2B is the new B2C, and Meru is leading the B2B digital revolution in the region.

Meru is headquartered in Mexico City and has offices in Hangzhou, China.

If you want to be a part of the game changer, JOIN MERU!

name: Alchemy Commerce
headline: Visual development for React, starting with e-commerce 🔮
description: Alchemy is a platform that enables brands to build unique e-commerce experiences without code. High-growth companies use us to iterate faster without being held back by clunky apps and 2010-style templating languages.

name: Yummy Future
headline: Yummy Future is building the AWS of food robotics.
description: Yummy Future is a robotics company working on massive adoption of intelligent robots into everyday life. We are launching one of the world’s most advanced coffee vending systems (https://yummy-future.webflow.io/ ), as the first step towards a future where humans co-living with robots. Our robotic coffee shops can run on 40X lower labor cost ,6X higher profit margin compared to normal coffee shops.

name: Cashfree
headline: Next-gen digital payments provider for India.
description:
Cashfree is a next-generation payments company for Indian businesses. 

Cashfree helps 50,000+ businesses collect and send money with solutions such as an easy to integrate payment gateway that supports instant settlements & refunds; Payouts - an API banking platform for bulk disbursals; a split payment solution for marketplaces; a Bank Account Verification API; a dedicated UPI stack for businesses and Auto Collect - a virtual account solution to match inbound payments to customers. It counts Xiaomi, Tencent, Zomato, Zoomcar, Cred, Club Factory, Shell, Google-backed Dunzo as well as donation platforms like Ketto and Milaap amongst its customers.

Cashfree works with all leading banks to build the core payments and banking infrastructure that powers Cashfree’s products. Cashfree is also integrated with major platforms like Shopify, Wix, Paypal, Amazon Pay, Ola Money and Google Pay.

name: Modern Treasury
headline: Payment operations tools for money movement.
description: Modern Treasury offers tools that automate the full cycle of money movement—from payment initiation, through approvals, to reconciliation—and are accessible through web application or API.

name: GoJom
headline: One-stop-shop for Real Estate Solutions.
description: GoJom is a One Stop Shop for Real Estate Solutions. It’s technology creates a  faster and easier way to buy, sell and rent properties in LaTam.

name: Payflow
headline: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid their salary on-demand.
description: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid whenever they want, instead of just once a month (or biweekly). We sell it to companies as an employee benefit (B2B SaaS).

name: DreamWorld
headline: The game where everyone creates together
description: DreamWorld is the massive digital world where everyone creates together. Think Minecraft or Roblox, a platform where players create, except one immersive social world.

name: Metaphor
headline: Searching the internet with large language models
description: We're building a new search engine over the internet using techniques inspired by large language models. Self-supervised learning is a paradigm that will produce radically new capabilities in many areas of tech. We're applying it to search, and in doing so, we hope to make sorting through the huge amount of information on the internet as easy as if you were calling up a memory.

name: Reviving Mind
headline: Telehealth provider for older adults addressing chronic illness
description:
Navigating chronic illness is an isolating and lonely process which ultimately reduces medical adherence and adversely impacts outcomes. There are over 100 deadly chronic conditions as 1 out of 2 Americans is currently living with at least 1 chronic condition. The US healthcare system has over $1 trillion dollars in direct costs. Medical adherence rates for therapeutic programs and medicine are only 50% because patients feel lonely, isolated, and unsupported in their chronic illness journey.

Reviving Mind is an in-network telehealth provider that improves clinical outcomes and program adherence for the senior medicare and medicare-advantage population that is plagued with loneliness and chronic illness. This is done through a novel and proprietary clinical program and technology platform that integrates virtual, private, curated, and professionally led groups that scale up to 8-patients with individualized and goal oriented lifestyle medicine coaching that is automated but managed by a licensed provider.

Scaling rapidly across the United States.

name: ScholarSite
headline: Expert-led executive education through live cohorts
description:
ScholarSite is a web app that allows the world's best academics and experts to run live cohort based courses with professionals from leading companies.

Professional learners are taught by a world class expert, each cohort is directly applicable to a specific job role and they join a lifelong community of like-minded professionals - all at a fraction of the price and in a far more flexible, engaging format than traditional and online degrees.

Instructors gain huge financial upside (80% of course earnings), they build their brand with leading companies and Scholarsite takes care of distribution, community management and administration (payments, scheduling, content management etc).

 We've sold into over 310 companies (including Google, Amazon, Dropbox, Tencent and more) and are growing revenue 40%+ month on month. 

While we are starting with executive education, our vision is to become the world's largest decentralized university (without the bureaucracy and bloat of a traditional institution!).

name: Gridware
headline: Hardware + software to detect powerline failure and prevent wildfires.
description: Gridware provides a grid monitoring system of sensors and software for the power distribution grid. The system centers around a low-cost hardware platform that is easily and permanently deployed to power poles. The platform detects and predicts faults that ignite wildfires, expedites repairs during a power outage, and helps utilities demonstrate risk reduction to regulators through comprehensive asset health profiles.

name: OneSchema
headline: 10x faster CSV data setup for customer onboarding
description: OneSchema enables operations teams to import customer CSV data 10x faster. Our product is an intelligent data cleaning tool for CSV files. Operations teams use OneSchema when they need to repeatedly upload data to a system with a known schema (for example, setting up a new customer's data in a SaaS product or uploading a supplier inventory catalogs). OneSchema can instantly check for errors in a CSV file and suggests fixes. We save operations teams valuable time and save customers from the headache of data cleansing. OneSchema’s vision is to enable 1-click transformation of data between any two systems.

name: Bite Ninja
headline: Cloud labor for restaurants
description: Our platform allows restaurants to outsource their drive-thru and front-counter shifts to trained freelancers working from home offices.

name: Orchata
headline: Groceries delivered in 15 min
description:
Orchata is building Gopuff/Getir in Latinamerica

Get your groceries delivered in 15 min with no substitutes and at supermarket prices. All the way from fresh fruits, vegetables, drinks, proteins, snacks to bread, medicine and household essentials. 

We are operating our own darkstores in Mexico with efficient picking and hyperfast delivery.

name: Activeloop
headline: Cloud for AI.
description:
Activeloop is building the data store for AI. We provide a simple API for creating, storing, versioning, and collaborating on AI datasets of any size. With Activeloop's open-core stack, you can rapidly transform and stream data while training models at scale. In addition, you can instantly explore and visualize datasets for AI. Activeloop Hub is one of the fastest-growing libraries on GitHub, and is used by Google, Waymo, Red Cross and others. 

Activeloop is founded by a team from Princeton, Stanford, Google, Tesla, Equinix employees. We are backed by Y Combinator and other prominent investors from Silicon Valley.

name: Alinea
headline: The Smart Next Gen Investing App 💫
description: Alinea is an investing app for GenZs who want to understand the companies they are investing in. We explain how each company makes money, how they treat their stakeholders, and their environmental impact on the world so customers can buy stock in companies they believe in.

name: AlgoUniversity
headline: Building Job driven Virtual Tech University for India 🇮🇳
description:
We are building live teaching infrastructure that enables handful of top educators (from Google, Facebook, etc) to coach a large number of students.
We train college students in a year-long live cohorts and they pay us a portion of their salary as fees once they get a tech job (Income Sharing Agreement)

name: Iona Mind
headline: Software-based mental health treatments
description:
Iona Mind is building the first FDA approved digital treatment for anxiety and depression.

Our products are based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), one of the most effective evidence-based forms of treatment, which is delivered in a fully automated way using a conversational interface. Unlike other wellbeing apps, our exercises and programs are evidence-based, with over 300 peer reviewed journal papers showing the efficacy of CBT in the treatment of many common mental health conditions. 
 
Our mental wellness app is currently available through the App and Play stores and helps thousands of people all over the world. We also support employers in providing evidence-based mental health support to all their staff. 
 
Our founding team includes Professor Paul Farrand, one of the world's leading experts in Low-Intensity Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and one of the architects of the modern mental health system in the UK and Philip Howson who was CTO of XTX Markets - one of the world’s largest algorithmic trading firms.

name: FundersClub
headline: Online VC
description: FundersClub discovers, funds, and supports the world's best technology startups. FundersClub created the first online venture capital platform and invests starting at Seed, following on through Growth. The portfolio includes Instacart, Coinbase, GitLab, Webflow, Rappi, Flexport, EquipmentShare, and other category-defining companies.

name: Cumbuca
headline: Multiplayer banking with bill splitting for Brazilian families.
description: Cumbuca is the first digital group account for Brazilian families. By grouping individual accounts with a shared permission system that's completely customizable, Cumbuca mimics the experience of American joint accounts - which aren't available in Brazil - providing features such as shared savings, debt tracking and bill splitting on everything from utilities to groceries and online delivery, so you don't ever have to argue with your loved ones again.

name: Zeo Auto
headline: Route Planning and fleet management software.
description:
Zeo Auto is a route optimisation and fleet management platform. 

Our route optimisation solutions are used by drivers and independent businesses to plan multistop deliveries via Zeo Route planner app.  

The fleet management solutions are used by fleet owners having 10 - 50 fleet size. We are a device agnostic player compatible 50+ protocols covering 80% of the market. We use GPS based location tracking and OBD installations as a hook to provide an array of services and integrations that help owners save time, money and improve vehicle and team's efficiency.

Zeo Auto supports fleet managers, independent drivers and businesses in managing end to end operations right from enabling driver communication, providing ETA, route planning, trip management, vehicle tracking (speed, distance and location), waybill generation, capturing orders etc. essentially making us a lifeline for this 35B$ logistics industry.

Our solutions have been used in 50 + countries. We have enabled 15000+ deliveries via our route planner app and growing at 80% WOW.  We have enabled 6mn+ trips via our fleet management solutions across 30000 trucks.

name: Ontop
headline: Multi-country payroll manager for LATAM
description: Ontop is a payroll manager for LATAM. Companies like Rappi use us to hire legally and pay anyone in the world. We are building the infrastructure for the future of work in LATAM

name: Bot MD
headline: AI Clinical Assistant for Doctors
description: Bot MD is an A.I assistant for doctors. Our company's mission is to Empower Doctors around the world. Bot MD can be trained on any type of hospital content to provide instant answers to clinical questions.

name: Loops
headline: Email sending for startups
description: Loops is a simple and beautiful email sending platform for SaaS companies. We have a Notion-style block editor for email creation, a beautiful code editor based on VS Code, and pre-built loops for SaaS companies to snap-in to increase their revenue and user engagement.

name: Swifter
headline: Stripe for Cannabis
description: Swifter offers a suite of payments solutions, including ACH, tailored to the unique needs of the cannabis industry. Standalone dispensary, MSO, or a marketplace, use Swifter's software and APIs to accept payments, send payouts, and supercharge your growth.

name: Gusto
headline: Provides small businesses with everything to take care of their teams.
description:
Launched in 2012 as ZenPayroll, Gusto serves more than 200,000 businesses nationwide. Each year we process tens of billions of dollars of payroll and provide employee benefits—like health insurance and 401(k) accounts—while helping companies create incredible work places.

Through one refreshingly easy, integrated platform, we automate and simplify your payroll, benefits, and HR, all while providing expert support. You and your employees will get the peace of mind you need to do your best work.

name: Mayanalytics
headline: A growth automation platform for Amazon sellers
description: We help Amazon sellers grow their business with our data-driven automations. We are starting out with advertising and inventory. From there, we're moving to other avenues that help accelerate brand growth!

name: Verifiable
headline: API for healthcare compliance

name: CARUPI
headline: CARUPI is the world's 1st managed P2P marketplace for used cars.
description: Carupi is the world's 1st lightly managed peer-to-peer digital marketplace ("C2C"), like Airbnb, for used cars, allowing individuals to safely and conveniently buy and sell cars from home with the push of a button. Differently from pure marketplaces such as craigslist, we take care of every transaction end-to-end (as 'concierges'), from taking car photos at the user's place to advertising his car, managing offers, taking his car (fully insured) to buyers for free at-home test drives, handling paperwork and payment. And differently from dealers or dealer-like companies, we don't use any physical infrastructure or need to buy cars for inventory.

name: Corvus Robotics
headline: Autonomous drones to help warehouses scan inventory.
description: Our software allows drones to fly indoors and collect analytics, helping warehouses automate inventory collection.

name: Marathon Education
headline: We're building an after-school education metaverse
description:
Step 1: We provide live after-school tutoring for students in Vietnam, taught by the top 1% of teachers nationally
Step 2: We do a massive pivot to Web3
Step 3: ???
Step 4: Profit

name: Unforgettable AI
headline: Personalized rich media marketing at scale
description: We make delivering personalized audio and video messages as easy as sending an email. Our mission is to help companies create and deliver 10x better marketing content with less effort.

name: Bottomless
headline: Building the first sensor enabled marketplace for repeat purchases

name: AlphaFlow
headline: AlphaFlow is a technology-driven investment manager.
description:
Access. Transparency. Technology. Founded in 2015, AlphaFlow is a technology-driven investment manager providing professionally managed portfolios of real estate loans. We make the $75 billion fix-and-flip industry accessible to institutional investors. With the recent launch of our new platform, TITAN, we’ve opened up our institutional platform to smaller investors.

As a result of leading with technology and data analytics AlphaFlow is able to provide transparency & speed at a rate our competitors can’t. We partner with non-bank real estate lenders who provide 6-12 month bridge loans on single-family and small multifamily properties by purchasing their loans thereby helping them grow their businesses.

AlphaFlow uses software to streamline and automate today’s manual workflow and our engineering team is constantly developing simple and elegant solutions to further automate a manually intensive industry.

name: Easol
headline: The all-in-one platform to manage your entire experience business.
description:
Easol is the all-in-one platform for managing your entire experience business, on your terms. Sell directly on your own website with smart booking, payment, and marketing tools that all work together, brilliantly.

We believe that with the right tools, anyone can turn their passion into an empire. So we made them – and brought them together to work in sync, all in one place.

We call it Experience Commerce. It's e-commerce specially designed for selling experiences and especially designed for experience creators.

name: Bikayi
headline: Shopify for India
description: An app to help SMBs create their whatsapp integrated online stores without hassle as easy as forwarding messages on whatsapp.

name: Skill-lync
headline: Online engineering college for India. Learn technical skills & get…
description: Skill-Lync provides job leading engineering education online. We started with a special focus in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics & Civil engineering and have become one of the world's leading & highest rated platforms in teaching high-end technical skills that help students get a job.

name: Beacons
headline: The best mobile website builder for content creators
description: We help content creators build mobile websites for their businesses.

name: Homebase
headline: Personalized rent-to-own real estate financing using technology in SEA
description:
Homebase provides Rent-To-Own real estate financing for buyers in Southeast Asia - the only alternative to inflexible/high-interest rate (12%+) mortgages in the region. We strive to provide more innovative, compelling, and empathetic solutions for those who aspire to own a home.

Homebase was founded in 2019 in Singapore and is backed by Y Combinator, VinaCapital Ventures, Class 5 Global, Pegasus Technology Ventures, 1982 Ventures, Iterative VC and Antler, as well as the founders and executives at disruptive real estate financing companies including Opendoor, Zerodown, 99.co and Divvy Homes.

name: Rent the Backyard
headline: Helping homeowners make money from their backyards by building housing
description: Rent the Backyard helps you earn income by building a backyard home. From financing and permitting, to construction and renting the unit, we help you through the entire process and make it easy to make the most of your backyard.

name: BLISSWAY
headline: Solving Highway Congestion
description: BLISSWAY is developing a new tolling technology that gives cities the ability to maintain free flow conditions on highways 24/7, with massive monetization of road assets as a byproduct. We achieve this via roadside solar-powered cameras, state-of-the-art ML & optimization algorithms, and a smartphone app. Our first pilot was deployed in Colorado in August of 2020.

name: Kunduz
headline: Kunduz provides instant answers to students' questions and makes…
description: Kunduz is making test prep resources 10x faster and cheaper for students who prepare for university entrance tests. With its first mobile platform, Kunduz provides instant answers to students’ test prep questions through its 35,000 tutors. Kunduz currently serves students in Turkey and India.

name: Charge Running
headline: Provides live, virtual running classes to runners all around the world
description:
Charge Running is a community for all runners. We host 20+ live virtual running classes and races per day, where runners join and run together from all over the world through a mobile app. Each class is hosted by a live, certified run coach, that tracks all participants' distances, paces, cadences, and interval summaries as they lead the runners via audio through effort-based run classes.

Each runner can chat with the coach and other participants of the run, as well as see in real-time the distance of every other runner, no matter where they run from. This creates an incredibly motivational experience. 

In addition to our daily lineup of classes, Charge hosts virtual races, partnering with race directors and charities to offer a virtual racing experience, with an in-person feel.

name: RealCrowd
headline: Direct real estate investing marketplace
description: RealCrowd puts the power of commercial real estate investing into your hands. This unique crowd based equity platform was created by experienced commercial real estate investment professionals to allow you to decide where your money is invested by offering direct investments. Pooling your money with other like-minded investors and working with a seasoned real estate operator with the skills, knowledge and experience to optimize the asset will remove the traditional barriers to entry that typically exist in commercial real estate investing.

name: Cowrywise
headline: Digitizing wealth management in Africa
description: Cowrywise is a FinTech company democratizing access to premium financial services by making these services available to the mass market cheaply. We are leveraging technology and investment management to re-imagine how financial planning, savings and investment products are delivered to people. We do this by helping our customers achieve their savings and investments goals in a simple, secure and affordable manner.

name: inFeedo
headline: Conversational AI to engage remote employees & predict churn/burnout
description:
Our A.I. bot Amber has intelligent conversations with employees to
find hidden issues at each critical moment from their first to last day at work.

We then build a holistic view of each employee with insights from all data sources to help predict churn, burnout & disengagement in remote/top talent.

name: Zealth
headline: Software for remote monitoring of cancer patients
description:
Zealth is building remote monitoring software to help hospitals provide automated continuous round-the-clock support to their cancer patients post-discharge. 

Hospitals are overburdened with no resources to provide care to their chronic patients once they leave the hospital. For instance, in India, there are only 2200 oncologists for 1.38 billion people. Patients travel 100 miles waiting for hours to get few minutes with the doctors. They have no easy means to manage all the toxicities and symptoms they get once they are back home. This leads to 6X lower patient retention, 4X high emergency readmissions, and poor patient outcomes. 

Zealth bridges this gap through its digital health intervention platform.

name: May Mobility
headline: Transforming cities with self-driving shuttles.
description: May Mobility is a leader in autonomous vehicle technology development and deployment. With more than 300,000 autonomous rides to date, May Mobility is committed to delivering safe, efficient and sustainable shuttle solutions designed to complement today’s public transportation options. The company’s ultimate goal is to realize a world where self-driving systems make transportation more accessible and reliable, the roads safer, and encourage better land use in order to foster more green, vibrant, and livable spaces.

name: Clupp
headline: Neo-insurer for low mileage drivers for LatAm
description: Insurance penetration in LatAm is extremely low (30% for cars & 10% for motorcycles). This is because there is not an appropriate product for most vehicles (price, payment options, and distribution channels, etc.). We created a mobile app that can offer a fair insurance for any vehicle (cars, motorcycles, bikes, scooters) based on driving behavior. Then we added gamification, payment options for the unbanked population, and more.

name: JABU Logistics
headline: Last-mile distribution marketplace for informal retailers in Africa
description: HQ in Namibia, and expanding in Southern Africa, JABU helps shops and bars place orders digitally to stock up their shop, and JABU fulfills the demand on the same-day through tech-enabled warehousing, last mile distribution and payment collection. On the FMCG side, JABU is empowering brands managers with live dashboards where they interact with the new frontier of retail. Now launching a wallet, merchant services for banks and merchandising services for brands.

name: Proper
headline: Modern financial data infrastructure for fintechs
description:
Proper provides APIs to help fintechs manage their financial data. We help connect payments providers in a single platform, with tools for maintaining financial accuracy and expediting the development of financial infrastructure. We provide modular components that include: a core ledger, a unified financial data platform, and financial operations APIs for reconciliation, compliance, and accounting. 

We integrate with API providers & low level protocols so users can stitch together a winning stack. With Proper, you can spend less time on low-level financial data infrastructure and more time focused on building for your end-users.

name: Odeko
headline: The operating platform for small businesses.
description: Odeko is building a suite of tools that give small food service businesses the ability to operate at the scale of a global franchise without losing their soul.

name: Rinsed
headline: Software to run car washes moving to a monthly subscription model

name: Teleport
headline: Teleport enables engineers to quickly access any computing resource…
description: Our open source products provide a Unified Access Plane (UAP) for developers and security professionals seeking to simplify secure access to servers, applications, and data across all environments. Our Unified Access Plane solution includes Server Access, Kubernetes Access, Application Access and Database Access.

name: PopSQL
headline: SQL editor for teams
description:
Every company wants to use data to make informed decisions, and SQL is the lingua franca for data. However, data collaboration is broken. People are rewriting each other's queries, switching apps to visualize their data, and copying/pasting SQL into Slack.

PopSQL solves this by creating a beautiful, fun way to write SQL, visualize data, and share results. The product is loved by data teams from over 2000 companies including DoorDash, Shipt, Redfin, and Optimizely. What we've built so far is just the beginning. Join us and build a great product, a great culture, and a great company 🚀

name: Optic
headline: Making APIs Developer-friendly
description:
## About Optic

[Optic](https://useoptic.com) is building a modern and developer-friendly version control workflow for APIs. Our open source tool automatically documents existing APIs, detects breaking changes, and help teams collaborate better through APIs. Imagine how amazing it would be if the tools we used for managing APIs (ie OpenAPI/Swagger) were as developer-friendly, easy to use, and ubiquitous, as the tools we use to manage our code (ie Git/GitHub) -- that's what we're building at Optic.

**If you join us, you’ll be an early team member helping to shape:**
1. our culture
2. product strategy, focus and direction
3. our business and growth strategy
4. engineering practices
5. the people that we hire

We're backed by **Boldstart**, **YCombinator** and the **founders of the developer tools you use daily**.

- [Optic on GitHub](https://github.com/opticdev/optic)
- [Read our docs](https://optic10.useoptic.com/docs)
- [Listen to Aidan on Software Engineering Daily](https://useoptic.com/blog/optic-se-daily/)

name: Rootly
headline: Manage incidents like outages directly in Slack
description:
Rootly is an incident management platform and Slackbot designed to help companies resolve incidents faster by automating manual admin tasks and providing insight to prevent them in the future.

Key Features:
- Incident Slackbot
- Automated Runbooks
- Status Pages
- Postmortems
- Service Catalog
- Metrics
- 30+ Integrations

name: Experiment
headline: crowdfunding platform for science
description:
Today's funders are so conservative they only fund the most obvious ideas. At Experiment, we fund the ideas that they won't fund; the ideas that matter.

Since founding, over 47,000 citizens have pledged $9 million dollars supporting 900 scientific projects on the platform. 46% of all projects on Experiment are successfully funded. When the projects are finished, the scientists share the scientific results with their backers as lab notes and peer-reviewed publications.

Scientists from Stanford, Harvard, and Yale have chosen to use Experiment instead of writing grants. Bill Gates recognized Experiment by saying "this solution helps close the gap for potentially-promising but unfunded projects."

name: CrediBook
headline: Faire for Indonesian SMEs
description:
CrediBook digitizes the MSMEs' supply chain, from wholesale to retail, through online wholesale and bookkeeping operation system.

Our online wholesale platform CrediMart aims to create an efficient inventory-sourcing. We provide online-ordering, Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) payment method, and logistic support. We help our wholesale partners earn an additional daily income stream by 50%.

Our bookkeeping app CrediBook also enables MSMEs generate financial report in less than 5 minutes and proven to speed up users’ micro-loans process from financial institutions.
CrediBook strives to encourage more MSMEs to benefit digitalization from easy and efficient platforms that meet their needs.

name: Scanwell Health
headline: Smartphone-enabled, at-home diagnostics
description: Scanwell Health makes healthcare more accessible through smartphone-enabled, at-home diagnostics. Scanwell's innovative approach lets people test from anywhere, skip the waiting room and get same-day results. By quickly diagnosing acute illnesses, chronic diseases and rare conditions, Scanwell accelerates the path to treatment. Our first product is the only FDA-cleared over-the-counter app that provides testing and treatment for urinary tract infections (UTIs).

name: Datree
headline: Datree prevents Kubernetes misconfigurations from reaching production
description:
Prevent Kubernetes misconfigurations from reaching production with Datree’s automated policy checks for your pipeline. 

The open-source CLI tool empowers engineers to write more stable and secure configurations, and further supports them in their roles so they can actually sleep at night. 

By revealing misconfigurations in seconds and combating the issues in early stages of the pipeline, your organization can enforce its standards and secure its infrastructure from development to production.

name: Hyper
headline: Sell access to your Discord server.
description: Founded in Philly in March 2020, Hyper began as a way for communities on Discord to monetize their servers and build scalable businesses. From sneakerheads to musicians and photographers to NFT enthusiasts, thousands of community owners use Hyper to make millions of dollars every month.

name: Contentfly
headline: High quality, on-demand content for hypergrowth companies
description:
Contentfly is an on-demand platform for creating high-quality content for businesses. We automatically connect companies to world class content creators to help companies quickly scale content creation; clients simply submit a request for any form of content, Contentfly finds the best writer, and the written content is emailed days later. 

Today, companies create a ton of content ($400B was spent on content marketing in 2019), but hiring in-house talent or freelancers can be slow and expensive. Contentfly has already helped 2,000+ businesses scale content creation and has seen 400+ growth over the past year. 

Contentfly is led by the former head of growth at Zapier, and backed by Khosla Ventures, Y Combinator, Global Founders Capital, FJ Labs, Pioneer Fund, Soma Capital, and a number of other investors. (HQ: Canada)

name: Lumify
headline: The super app for healthcare workers.
description: Lumify is the digital home for all healthcare workers. With Lumify, healthcare workers can find, share, and buy the gear and resources they need to excel. We do this through Lumify’s line of products and super app, which unifies the brands, organizations, and resources that healthcare workers need and love.

name: ZOKO
headline: Better Business on WhatsApp
description:
Zoko makes it easy for businesses, to do Sales, Marketing and Customer Support on WhatsApp. 

There are 100 million merchants worldwide, already using WhatsApp for their businesses. The founders started off with an ecommerce business, entirely on WhatsApp, which grew to a customer base of 200K followers who would make purchases after seeing their weekly WhatsApp updates. 

Other businesses started reaching out to them, offering to pay for their "WhatsApp sales tools". That was the Aha moment! The founders realized that selling these tools to other businesses, was the way to go. 

In fact, 175 million people message a business on WhatsApp everyday. Even Amazon can't beat that! There is a dire need for tools that allow businesses to use WhatsApp effectively as a channel to sell online. The market size for ecommerce on WhatsApp is estimated be north of $50B/year.

WhatsApp is the internet of the #nextbillion and Zoko plans to become the Shopify for merchants, selling on WhatsApp.

name: Mono
headline: A bank account that integrates LatAm SMEs' finances and operations.
description: We offer a corporate bank account that integrates with accounting, tax and payroll systems allowing SMEs owners in LatAm manage their business in just one place.

name: Tavus
headline: AI Generated Personalized Videos
description: We're building a new video based experience for marketing and product teams. We make personalized video outreach scalable with AI. Record a video once, and send it to thousands instantly completely customized to them.

name: Wyvern
headline: High-res hyperspectral images from unfolding space telescopes.
description: Wyvern is a space data company that will capture the highest resolution hyperspectral images from satellites that cost 100X less than satellites using traditional telescopes.

name: 8vdX
headline: Founder Friendly Acceleration Capital
description:
8vdX is revolutionizing venture debt by building a platform that provides access to capital to startups when they need it most, which is before their equity raise, not after. 
The 8vdX platform provides founder-friendly acceleration capital with minimum dilution to startups accepted in the Y Combinator program to fuel their growth and support them to achieve their demo day goals. The platform also enables investors to participate in funding each batch and nurture the growth of potential unicorns.

name: Decent
headline: Enabling fans to invest in artists & share in their success.
description: Decent enables musicians to monetize their work directly through their fans, aligning artist & fan incentives to reinvent funding, IP protection, and discovery.  We do this through a marketplace and infrastructure that enables musicians to issue NFTs collateralized by their royalties.

name: Greenwork
headline: LinkedIn for Skilled Blue-Collar Workers
description: Greenwork helps government-funded training programs find jobs for the ten million people they train per year. Starting with this beachhead, we’re building LinkedIn for blue-collar workers to help companies make the most difficult hires in today’s labor market: skilled tradespeople.

name: Spinach.io
headline: Crush your daily standup
description:
Spinach.io is on a mission to make meetings better, starting with daily standups.
As one of the first apps on Zoom’s new app store, Spinach.io is fully integrated into Zoom meetings and enables faster, more productive standups. 

In addition to YC, we’re backed by Zoom, Tuesday Capital, Maven Ventures and other great investors.

name: OpenOps
headline: Project Management for Supply Chain
description: OpenOps is a project management tool for ecommerce businesses to effectively work with their supply chain. We do this by providing a Gmail extension that enables teams and suppliers to collaborate without leaving their inbox.

name: Vecindario
headline: We provide technology to simplify the home-buying process in LATAM
description:
In Vecindario we integrate the real estate ecosystem with our technology. Our services include,
but are not limited to, digital sales, inventory management, payments, mortgages, open APIs to
connect to different platforms and many more. In other words, we provide everything a person
needs to buy an apartment end to end 100% online in just one place.
